Name: LG - 7.4 Cu. Ft. Smart Electric Dryer with Steam and Sensor Dry - Black Steel
Description:
This LG dryer is designed to put time back on your side. When there’s no time to wash, quick and easy TurboSteam technology refreshes clothes and eases wrinkles in just 10 minutes. Forget about endless sorting or toggling through cycles. Built-in intelligence detects fabric texture and automatically selects the perfect settings, taking out the guesswork. Activate Smart Pairing in the ThinQ app, and the washer can even tell the dryer to select a compatible drying cycle, making it the ultimate laundry hack. Plus, with ThinQ Care, you can start and stop the dryer when you’re on the go and get preventative maintenance tips and alerts to keep your dryer running at its best. 
Sleek, Modern Style: Award-winning¹ design brings a premium look to your laundry space, with a flat front design, black steel finish, tinted, tempered glass doors and streamlined controls., 
Digital Dial Control with LCD Display: Our intuitive dial control gives you helpful information with each turn of the dial plus instant access to timesaving features like Smart Learner and Smart Pairing.², 
7.4 cu. ft. Ultra Large Capacity: Free up your day—fit more clothes in every load with 7.4 cu. ft. of space. Running fewer loads saves energy and money on your utility bill., 
TurboSteam and SteamFresh Technology: Go ahead, wear it again—in just 10 minutes, TurboSteam technology reduces wrinkles in up to 5 garments³ when you don’t have time to wash and SteamFresh cycle reduces odors⁴ and refreshes children’s toys, decorative pillows and more., 
ThinQ Care: Keep your appliances running smoothly with ThinQ Care, now in the ThinQ app. Get notifications about usage, maintenance, plus early diagnosis right on your phone. ThinQ Care will help you understand your appliance needs, avoid potential problems, and keep your appliance running its best., 
ThinQ Technology: The LG ThinQ app helps you manage your LG Smart appliance and more, all to make your everyday a little easier. Automatically reorder supplies based on actual usage. Start or stop programs on your way home from work⁵., 
: Even get proactive alerts with ThinQ Care to keep your appliance running smoothly—and your home running smarter. Compatible with Alexa and the Google Assistant and available for iOS and Android platforms, this free app will help you run your home like a pro., 
FlowSense Duct Clogging and Lint Filter Indicators: FlowSense Duct Clogging and Lint Filter Indicators tell when ducts and filter need cleaning of lint buildup, improve dryer performance for greater efficiency and lower utility bills, and give safer, worry-free operation with fewer service calls., 
ENERGY STAR Certified: High efficiency sensor drying and low-heat settings save energy and money by using about 20% less energy than conventional models without sacrificing features or performance.⁶, 
Closet Depth: More Style, Less Space. LG closet-depth⁷ washers and dryers have a shallower depth to fit in more places & add sleek style to any room., 
LoDecibel Quiet Operation: Run the dryer whenever you want, without interrupting naptime or your favorite show. This dryer is designed for quiet operation, from the motor to the cabinet to individual components. Pleasant end-of-cycle chime lets you know when clothes are dry., 
Reversible Door: When space is tight or your laundry room doesn’t fit a “typical” setup, this dryer’s door can easily be reversed to fit your needs. Go from a right swing to a left swing in minutes—just unscrew the hinges and reattach using the pre-drilled holes on the opposite side., 
Wrinkle Care Option: When you hate wrinkles but can’t remove clothes as soon as they’re dry, just select the Wrinkle Care option before hitting start. The dryer will periodically tumble the load for up to 3 hours after the cycle is done or until the door is opened to help keep wrinkles at bay., 
Tempered Glass Door with Chrome Rim: LG front load washers and dryers use tempered glass doors for a sleek, stylish look that resists shock and scratches. Chrome door rim and matching digital control knob complement the door and enhance the premium feel., 
NeveRust Stainless Steel Drum: Just because you want your dryer to last for years doesn’t mean you want it to look its age. The NeveRust Stainless Steel Drum is built to last., 
LG Pedestal Storage Drawer Compatible: 27" Pedestal Storage Drawers, sold separately, make loading and unloading a breeze while helping minimize laundry room clutter with a basket to help you stay organized., 
: Dryer cords are not shipped with the dryer. It is the responsibility of the consumer to purchase the appropriate cord for their home.,

Name: LG - 4.2 Cu. Ft. Stackable Smart Electric Dryer with Dual Inverter HeatPump - White
Description:
This sleek dryer offers big style and big capacity in a small 24” wide footprint, with a go-anywhere ventless design that can be installed side by side or stacked on top of a compact LG washer. But saving space is just the beginning—LG’s innovative HeatPump technology saves energy with the dryer usage on every load. Unlike conventional condenser ventless dryers that extract the moisture from clothes and pumps it out of the dryer, this dryer extracts the moisture and recycles it for more energy-efficient drying, every day. 
4.2 cu. ft. Compact Capacity: This dryer handles surprisingly big loads for its size while expanding your installation options at the same time. The ventless design means you can put it anywhere, without worrying about long ducting runs, access to exterior walls or maintenance., 
Dual Inverter HeatPump Technology: Meet a more modern approach to drying. LG HeatPump technology extracts moisture from clothes and recycles the warm, humid air., 
Auto Cleaning Condenser: Using water extracted during the drying cycle, it powerfully flushes away lint and debris every time you dry for better airflow, better drying and enhanced energy efficiency—automatically., 
ThinQ Care: Keep your appliances running smoothly with ThinQ Care, now in the ThinQ app. Get notifications about usage, maintenance, plus early diagnosis right on your phone. ThinQ Care will help you understand your appliance needs, avoid potential problems, and keep your appliance running its best., 
ThinQ Technology with Smart Pairing: Use the ThinQ app to start the laundry while you’re out shopping, check remaining cycle time or get notifications on your smartphone. Go hands-free—select features work with Alexa and the Google Assistant., 
Sensor Dry: No more damp clothes—the built-in sensor detects moisture levels and automatically adjusts drying time for loads of all sizes. No more overdrying—dryer shuts off at just the right time to save energy with less wear and tear on clothes., 
Tempered Glass Doors with Chrome Trim: LG front load washers and dryers are the first to use tempered glass doors for a sleek, stylish look that resists shock and scratches. Chrome rims and matching control knobs complement the doors and enhance the premium feel., 
ENERGY STAR Certified: High efficiency sensor drying and low-heat settings save energy and money by using about 20% less energy than conventional models without sacrificing features or performance., 
NeveRust Stainless Steel Tub: Unlike tubs made from porcelain or plastic, the LG NeveRust Stainless Steel Tub avoids the chips and nicks that can snag fabrics and ruin clothing. Durable surface actually gets smoother over time and keeps your washer/dryer looking like new, even after years of use., 
LoDecibel Quiet Operation: Run the dryer whenever you want, without interrupting naptime or your favorite show. This dryer is designed for quiet operation, from the motor to the cabinet to individual components. Pleasant end-of-cycle chime lets you know when clothes are dry.,

Description:
One push of the Extra Power button on Maytag heavy-duty dryers boosts drying power on any cycle by extending time, heat, and tumbling. Commercial-grade dryer technology ensures it's built to last, while optional smart electric dryer features such as remote start and cycle notifications help you stay in control and efficiently manage laundry from anywhere. 
Extra Power: Extra Power boosts drying power to get thick fabrics drier the first time.¹,

ENERGY STAR Certified: ENERGY STAR certified models exceed government standards to help conserve natural resources and save money on your utility bills.,

Steam Refresh Cycle: Built to reduce wrinkles, the Steam Refresh cycle quickly revives clothes without the need for a full wash cycle., 
Hamper Door: Sweep laundry onto the open hamper door to keep it off the floor. The latch-free door drops down, giving you a chute for loading and a sturdy platform for unloading, folding and stacking., 
10-year Limited Parts Warranty: We don’t just tell you a Maytag dryer will get your clothes dry for years: we confidently back our dryers with a 10-year limited parts warranty* on the drive motor and drum., 
Quick Dry Cycle: The Quick Dry cycle dries small loads fast. Clothes will be ready before you know it when paired with the Quick Wash cycle., 
Remote Start: Do laundry anywhere, anytime with your smartphone.² Set cycles with the option to choose from customized favorites, only available in the Maytag app, then start and stop the cycle remotely., 
Cycle Notifications: Finished loads won't be left behind with the Maytag app.² Get end of cycle notification on your smartphone with the option to Assign a Task to family members to keep laundry moving.,

Match Washer and Dryer Cycle: Get the best dry for your clothes without the guesswork. With the Maytag app, receive a recommended dry cycle that matches your last wash cycle, then send the cycle to your dryer.²,

Favorites: Create customized cycles and save them in the Maytag app. Instantly access Favorites from the app and send them to your washer or dryer to start the load remotely. ², 
American Pride: We take pride in building strong, reliable appliances for your home. These dryers are proudly assembled by hard-working employees in Marion, Ohio., 
Heavy-duty hinges: Heavy-duty door hinges are built tough for years of reliable opening and closing.,

Name: LG - 4.5 Cu. Ft. HE Smart Front Load Washer and 7.4 Cu. Ft. Electric Dryer WashTower with Steam and Built-In Intelligence - Nature Green
Description:
Full-size and fully featured, with the washer on the bottom and dryer on top, the sleek single unit LG WashTower takes up half the space, giving you room to add a sink, a folding table or whatever you like. But unlike conventional stacked pairs, LG’s Center Control panel is perfectly positioned with both washer and dryer controls at just the right height. Built-in intelligence makes laundry less of a chore by taking out the guesswork, while top-of-the-line innovations put advanced cleaning power within reach. 
Ultra Large Capacity 4.5 cu.ft. Washer and 7.4 cu.ft. Dryer (WashTower): Get it all done in less time. Ultra Large Capacity (4.5 cu. ft. in the washer and 7.4 cu. ft. in the dryer) means you have even more room to do laundry in fewer loads., 
Single Unit WashTower Design¹: This vertical laundry solution puts everything within reach. Full-size capacity and features in half the space¹, with a centralized control panel for the easiest access ever., 
Built-In Intelligence: Forget about endless sorting or toggling through cycles—built-in sensors use AI technology to detect fabric texture and load size, then automatically select the right wash/dry motions, temperatures and more for advanced fabric care., 
: Activate Smart Learner in the ThinQ app, and WashTower will remember your preferred settings, from wash temp to spin speed to dry level—so you don’t have to. With Smart Pairing, the washer can even tell the dryer to select a compatible drying cycle, making it the ultimate laundry hack., 
ThinQ Care: Keep your appliances running smoothly with ThinQ Care, now in the ThinQ app. Get notifications about usage, maintenance, plus early diagnosis right on your phone. ThinQ Care will help you understand your appliance needs, avoid potential problems, and keep your appliance running its best., 
Advanced washing and drying: From ultra-large capacity to high innovations, the LG WashTower delivers the advanced cleaning performance you need. TurboWash 360° powers through larger loads in less time, thanks to five jets with variable sprays that deliver a complete clean in under 30 minutes²., 
: The Allergiene wash cycle goes beyond everyday cleaning, using the power of steam to remove common household allergens such as dust, pet dander and pollen in fabrics by more than 95%.³, 
: Do more than dry—TurboSteam technology in the dryer refreshes clothes in between washes as well as children’s toys, decorative pillows and more., 
AAFA Certified LG Washer: AAFA certified LG washers with the Allergiene Cycle use the power of steam to remove over 95%³ of dust, pet dander and pollen., 
ThinQ Technology with ThinQ Care: The ThinQ App controls laundry remotely and ThinQ Care sends maintenance tips and alerts., 
Tempered Glass Doors with Trim: LG front load washers and dryers are among the first to use tempered glass doors for a sleek, stylish look that resists shock and scratches. Complementary matte black door trims and nature green finish enhance the premium feel., 
Direct Drive Motor 10-Year Limited Warranty: Backed by a 10-year limited warranty, the LG Direct Drive Motor delivers peace of mind with every load. Fewer moving parts means less noise and vibration, greater stability and durable performance you can depend on for years to come., 
ENERGY STAR Certified: Get additional savings that add up with each load without sacrificing performance., 
FlowSense Duct Clogging and Lint Filter Indicators: FlowSense Duct Clogging and Lint Filter Indicators tell when your ducts and filter need cleaning of lint buildup, improve dryer performance for greater efficiency and lower utility bills, and give worry-free operation with fewer service calls., 
NeveRust Stainless Steel Tub: Unlike porcelain or plastic tubs, LG NeveRust Stainless Steel Tubs avoid the chips and nicks that can snag fabrics and ruin clothing. Durable surface actually gets smoother over time and keeps your washer and dryer looking like new, even after years of use., 
TubClean System: With the LG TubClean system, you don’t have to worry about mold, mildew or musty odors. Select the TubClean cycle, add liquid bleach or other cleaner and let the washer work to thoroughly clean and dry the tub, door and gaskets., 
TrueBalance Anti-Vibration System: Noisy, out-of-balance loads can disrupt your laundry routine. LG helps you wash in peace with the TrueBalance anti-vibration system that keeps even big loads in balance to reduce washer noise and vibration. A must-have for main- or second-floor laundry rooms., 
LoDecibel Quiet Operation: Run the washer or dryer whenever you want, without interrupting naptime or your favorite show. The LG WashTower is designed for quiet operation, from the motor to the cabinet to individual components., 
Wrinkle Care Option: When you hate wrinkles but can’t be there to remove clothes as soon as they’re dry, select the Wrinkle Care option before starting. The dryer will periodically tumble the load for up to 3 hours after the cycle is done or until the door is opened to help keep wrinkles at bay., 
SpeedWash Cycle: Let's face it: Sometimes, you just don't have time to wait for a standard wash cycle. When you're in a rush, LG's SpeedWash Cycle gets small lightly soiled loads refreshed in just 15 minutes., 
: ¹Half the functional floor space., 
: ²Based on independent testing comparing models WKEX200/WKGX201 and WM3900 in normal cycle with TurboWash Option, 10 lb. load (June 2020),

Name: LG - 7.8 Cu. Ft. Stackable Smart Electric Dryer with Ventless Heat Pump Technology - White
Description:
Compared to conventional vented dryers, this LG HeatPump dryer uses up to 65% less energy to dry every load.¹ How? By smartly recycling the pre-warmed air rather than venting it outside. But savings are only one reason to start drying differently. Ventless design can be installed almost anywhere, with a modern look that elevates any room. Even caring for favorite clothes takes a new turn—our exclusive Direct Drive Motor delivers precise tumbling motions that are perfect for delicates. 
7.8 cu. ft. Mega Capacity: Say never again to never-ending piles of laundry—this mega capacity dryer is among the largest front load ventless heat pump unit in its class² and can easily handle the laundry needs of a family of five. How big is 7.8 cu. ft.? Big enough to fit a king-size comforter and more in a single load for big time savings every week., 
Sleek Ventless Design: Space-saving ventless design means it can be installed virtually anywhere. No detail was overlooked in this dryer's sleek, modern style. The flat front design with a choice of black steel, graphite steel or white finish and tinted, tempered glass door brings a premium point of view to your laundry space., 
LCD Digital Dial Control: Customize your dry—or let AI Dry do it for you. Laundry day is just that easy with LG’s built-in intelligence and intuitive LCD dial. Streamlined controls give you more of what you need with each turn of the dial, from descriptions of each setting and helpful prompts to status updates and remaining cycle time. Easily access more than 20 cycles and quickly modify any cycle using the touch panel for total laundry control., 
Dual Inverter Heat Pump Technology: Meet a more modern approach to drying. LG's DUAL Inverter Heat Pump technology uses up to 65% less energy to dry every load.³ Not only does this ENERGY STAR certified dryer feature LG’s most energy efficient ventless drying system, the low temperatures are easier on clothes and can help them look their best for longer. And with no need for venting, this dryer is easy to install and is virtually maintenance free., 
Inverter Direct Drive Motor System: When it comes to powerful, reliable performance, there’s just no comparison. Featuring LG Exclusive Direct Drive Dryer, this ventless dryer provides even drying performance and precise tumbling motions that are extra kind to delicates. You’ll enjoy quiet operation and greater energy efficiency than belt-driven motors—no belts, no pulleys, no worries. What else can you count on? The peace of mind of a 10-year limited warranty., 
Built-In Intelligence: AI Sensor Dry with Infrared Sensor: Forget about endless sorting or toggling through cycles—built-in sensors use AI technology to detect fabric texture and load size, then automatically select the right drying motions, temperatures and more for advanced fabric care. A combination of AI Sensor Dry plus an additional IR sensor detects moisture levels and automatically adjusts drying time for loads of all sizes., 
: All to ensure this ventless dryer delivers the LG drying performance you expect—no more damp clothes, no more over-drying., 
ThinQ Smart Technology: The ThinQ app offers control and convenience to help you simplify life and enjoy the comforts of home. Control your dryer remotely or use voice commands with Google or Alexa voice assistants. Plus, download additional cycles and access Smart Diagnosis, customer support, and more.⁴, 
ThinQ UP: ThinQ UP enabled smart appliances receive continual software updates for new downloadable features and enhancements sent wirelessly to the appliance. Choose which features you want and customize your appliance based on your lifestyle and personal preferences., 
ThinQ Care: Available within the ThinQ app, ThinQ Care sends proactive usage, maintenance, and diagnostic alerts to your smartphone to help keep your LG smart appliances running smoothly., 
Auto Cleaning Condenser: Unlike some dryers that require manual cleaning of the condenser for optimal performance, LG’s Auto Cleaning Condenser does the work for you. Using water extracted during the drying cycle, it powerfully flushes away lint and debris every time you dry for better airflow, better drying and enhanced energy efficiency—automatically., 
Closet Depth: LG closet-depth washers and dryers are worth showing off, but when space dictates otherwise it’s good to know they’ll easily fit in a closet with plenty of room to close the closet door. Install the pair side-by-side, or get a stacking kit and install the dryer over the washer to save even more space., 
NeveRust Stainless Steel Drum: Unlike tubs made from porcelain or plastic, the LG NeveRust Stainless Steel Tub avoids the chips and nicks that can snag fabrics and ruin clothing. Durable surface actually gets smoother over time and keeps your dryer looking like new, even after years of use., 
LoDecibel Quiet Operation: Run the dryer whenever you want, without interrupting naptime or your favorite show. This dryer is designed for quiet operation, from the motor to the cabinet to individual components. Pleasant end-of-cycle chime lets you know when clothes are dry., 
Wrinkle Care Option: When you hate wrinkles but can’t be there to remove clothes as soon as they’re dry, just select the Wrinkle Care option before hitting start. The dryer will periodically tumble the load for up to 3 hours after the cycle is done or until the door is opened to help keep wrinkles at bay.,

Let Maytag tackle your largest loads in this 7.0 cu. ft. capacity dryer. Extra Power Button: The Extra Power button boosts drying power on any cycle by extending time, heat and tumbling*. One push helps prevent underdrying by getting thick fabrics, pockets and seams drier the first time., 
Steam-Enhanced Dryer: Steam-enhanced dryers harness the power of steam to help prevent wrinkles and refresh clothes—even on deserted loads., 
Wrinkle Prevent Option: Don’t worry about forgetting to take laundry out of the dryer. The Wrinkle Prevent option tumbles clothes for up to 150 minutes after the cycle ends to help prevent wrinkles from forming.,

Name: LG - 7.4 Cu. Ft. Stackable Smart Electric Dryer with Steam and Built-In Intelligence - White
Description:
No longer just a companion to your washer, the LG DLEX4200W electric front load dryer delivers a new level of convenience and clothing care. TurboSteam technology reduces wrinkles in just 10 minutes for those times when there is no time to wash. Built-in intelligence automatically selects the right settings to eliminate the guesswork, and can even talk to your washer to pick a compatible cycle. Smart features fit your life with the ability to start the dryer when you are on the go or send routine maintenance updates to help you protect your investment. All of this convenience with a sleed design and scratch-resistant tempered glass door with chrome accents. 
7.4 cu. ft. Ultra Large Capacity: Free up your day—fit more clothes in every load with 7.4 cu. ft. of space. Running fewer loads saves energy and money on your utility bill., 
TurboSteam Technology: Go ahead, wear it again—in just 10 minutes, TurboSteam technology reduces wrinkles and odors in up to 5 garments when you don’t have time to wash. Also refreshes children’s toys, decorative pillows and more., 
Built-In Intelligence: Built-in sensors use AI technology to detect fabric texture and load size, then automatically select the right drying motions, temperatures and more for advanced fabric care. Sensor Dry detects moisture levels and automatically adjusts drying time for loads of all sizes, 
ThinQ Care: Keep your appliances running smoothly with ThinQ Care, now in the ThinQ app. Get notifications about usage, maintenance, plus early diagnosis right on your phone. ThinQ Care will help you understand your appliance needs, avoid potential problems, and keep your appliance running its best., 
ThinQ Technology: No matter where you are, use the ThinQ app to start the dryer, extend cycle time to avoid wrinkles and receive an alert when clothes are dry. Go hands-free—select dryer features work with Alexa and the Google Assistant., 
Tempered Glass Door: LG front load washers and dryers are the first to use tempered glass doors for a sleek, stylish look that resists shock and scratches. The premium feel is further enhanced by matching door trim and control knob accents*., 
FlowSense Duct Clogging and Lint Filter Indicators: FlowSense Duct Clogging and Lint Filter Indicators tell when ducts and filter need cleaning of lint buildup, improve dryer performance for greater efficiency and lower utility bills, and give safer, worry-free operation with fewer service calls., 
ENERGY STAR Certified: High efficiency sensor drying and low-heat settings save energy and money by using about 20% less energy than conventional models without sacrificing features or performance., 
Closet Depth: LG closet-depth washers and dryers are worth showing off, but when space dictates otherwise it’s good to know they’ll easily fit in a closet with plenty of room to close the closet door. Install the pair side-by-side, or get a stacking kit and install the dryer over the washer., 
Aluminized Alloy Steel Drum: An advanced aluminized alloy coating is added to the steel dryer drum to enhance durability and maintain its luster and attractive finish. Helps keep nicks and chips at bay so your dryer looks like new even after years of use., 
LoDecibel Quiet Operation: Run the dryer whenever you want, without interrupting naptime or your favorite show. This dryer is designed for quiet operation, from the motor to the cabinet to individual components. Pleasant end-of-cycle chime lets you know when clothes are dry., 
Reversible Door: When space is tight or your laundry room doesn’t fit the “typical” setup, this dryer’s door can easily be reversed to fit your needs. Go from a right swing to a left swing in minutes—just unscrew the hinges and reattach using the pre-drilled holes on the opposite side., 
Wrinkle Care Option: When you hate wrinkles but can’t be there to remove clothes as soon as they’re dry, just select the Wrinkle Care option. The dryer will periodically tumble the load for up to 3 hours after the cycle is done or until the door is opened to help keep wrinkles at bay.,

Description:

7.3 cu. ft. Ultra Large Capacity: Free up your day—fit more clothes in every load with 7.3 cu. ft. of space. Running fewer loads saves energy and money on your utility bill.,

7.4 cu. ft. Ultra Large Capacity: Free up your day—fit more clothes in every load with 7.4 cu. ft. of space. Running fewer loads saves energy and money on your utility bill.,

Built-In Intelligence: Forget about endless sorting or toggling through cycles—built-in sensors use AI technology to detect fabric texture, soil level, and load size, then automatically select the right wash/dry motions, temperatures and more for advanced fabric care., 
: Activate Smart Learner² in the ThinQ app, and WashTower will remember your preferred settings, from wash temp to spin speed to dry level—so you don’t have to. With Smart Pairing, the washer can even tell the dryer to select a compatible drying cycle³, making it the ultimate laundry hack., 
Advanced Washing and Drying: From mega capacity to top-of-the-line innovations, the LG WashTower delivers the advanced cleaning performance you need., 
ezDispense Automatic Dispenser: Automatically dispenses the right amount of detergent and fabric softener, skipping refills for up to 18 loads⁴. Even get alerts on your smartphone when it’s time to refill, making laundry quick, easy and foolproof.⁵, 
Tempered Glass Doors: LG front load washers and dryers are the first to use tempered glass doors for a sleek, stylish look that resists shock and scratches. Chrome rim complements the doors and enhance the premium feel., 
Direct Drive Motor 10-Year Limited Warranty: Backed by a 10-year limited warranty, the LG Direct Drive Motor delivers peace of mind with every load. Fewer moving parts means less noise and vibration, greater stability and durable performance you can depend on for years to come., 
FlowSense Duct Clogging and Lint Filter Indicators: FlowSense Duct Clogging and Lint Filter Indicators tell when your ducts and filter need lint cleaning, improve dryer performance for greater efficiency and lower utility bills, and help give you safer, worry-free operation with fewer service calls., 
NeveRust Stainless Steel Tub: Unlike tubs made from porcelain or plastic, the LG NeveRust Stainless Steel Tubs avoid the chips and nicks that can snag fabrics and ruin clothing. Durable surface actually gets smoother over time and keeps your washer and dryer looking like new, even years later., 
Tub Clean System: With LG Tub Clean system, you don’t have to worry about mold, mildew or musty odors. Select the Tub Clean cycle, add liquid bleach or other cleaner and let the washer work to clean and dry the tub, door and gaskets. Run it every month or so to keep your washer clean and fresh., 
TrueBalance Anti-Vibration System: Noisy, out-of-balance loads can disrupt your laundry routine. LG helps you wash in peace with the TrueBalance anti-vibration system that keeps even big loads in balance to reduce washer noise and vibration. A must-have for main- or second-floor laundry rooms., 
LoDecibel Quiet Operation: Run the washer or dryer whenever you want, without interrupting naptime or your favorite show. The LG WashTower is designed for quiet operation, from the motor to the cabinet to individual components., 
LoDecibel Quiet Operation: When you hate wrinkles but can’t be there to remove clothes as soon as they’re dry, select the Wrinkle Care before hitting start. The dryer will periodically tumble the load for up to 3 hours after the cycle is done or until the door is opened to help keep wrinkles at bay.,

Name: Samsung - BESPOKE 7.6 Cu. Ft. Stackable Smart Electric Dryer with Steam and Super Speed Dry - Brushed Black
Description:
Samsung’s Bespoke Ultra Capacity Electric Dryer has a sleek, flat-panel design, comes in new premium colors, and is equipped with smart features that simplify your laundry experience. It has our Super Speed Dry, which optimally dries a full load in just 30 minutes, and our AI Smart Dial, which learns and recommends your favorite cycles and makes controlling your dryer a breeze. 
Bespoke design, intelligent dry: Laundry reimagined with a clean, flat-panel design and AI-powered features that simplify your cleaning routine. Choose from a variety of premium colors to create a laundry space that fits your style., 
Super Speed Dry: Dry a full load in just 30 minutes¹ and achieve a complete wash and dry in under an hour with an added Super Speed Washer, 
AI Smart Dial: Samsung’s easy to use, AI Smart Dial simplifies your dryer’s control panel, learns and recommends your favorite cycles,² and allows you to customize your cycle list, making laundry day a breeze, 
MultiControl: Eliminate the long reach and control your dryer right from your washer when the units are stacked³, 
Steam Sanitize+: Our Steam Sanitize+ cycle removes 95% of pollen from fabric, while Multi-Steam refreshes clothing and relaxes light wrinkles, 
ENERGY STAR Certified: ENERGY STAR® Certified, so you use less energy without sacrificing performance or functionality, 
Shallow Closet-Depth Fit: Perfect for any laundry space, this dryer has a shallower depth for easy closet installation, without sacrificing capacity., 
Flexible Installation: Install your washer and dryer stacked or side by side to fit any space., 
Wi-Fi Connectivity: Wi-Fi connected so you can get end-of-cycle alerts, remotely start and stop your dryer, schedule cycles on your time, and more right from your smartphone with the SmartThings App, 
Sensor Dry: Automatically optimizes the time and temperature of your drying cycle to protect your clothes from heat damage, while avoiding excess energy use., 
7.6 cu. ft. Ultra Capacity: Fewer loads, less time in the laundry room, and more time doing the things you love, 
Vent Sensor: A sensor continuously monitors the condition of your dryer's air duct to make sure it’s running safely and efficiently. Plus, automatic alerts let you know when it’s time to clean your air duct or check for obstructions so performance stays at its peak., 
Lint Filter Indicator: Worry less about lint or fluff blocking the dryer's air intake. The control panel provides a helpful reminder to clean the filter to keep your dryer running smoothly., 
Stainless Steel Drum: Keep your dryer looking like new with a durable stainless steel drum that helps prevent nicks and scratches., 
Premium Tempered Glass Door: Made with a more scratch-resistant, flat tempered glass, our premium design door combines an upscale look with a durable finish., 
Internal Drum Light: An internal drum light lets you see the contents of your dryer more clearly, meaning fewer missed socks or small items., 
Drying Rack: The included drying rack provides a perfect place to gently dry delicate items, sweaters and footwear., 
Reversible Dryer Door: Choose which way your dryer door opens to better suit your laundry room layout., 
ADA Compliant: With use of a Samsung Riser, your washer or dryer is compliant with the Americans with Disabilities Act (ADA), making loading and unloading much easier., 
Matching Washer: Samsung washers and dryers team up to make light work of laundry day, 
Matching Accessories: Round out your laundry setup with a matching pedestal, riser, and more.,

Description:

Full Touch On-Door Control Panel: Seamlessly, completely integrated into the door, adding to the distinctive look of your LG washer. TurboSteam Technology: Go ahead, wear it again—in just 10 minutes,¹ TurboSteam technology reduces wrinkles and odors in up to 5 garments when you don’t have time to wash. Also refreshes children’s toys, decorative pillows and more., 
Ergonomic Angled Door: The contoured front earns high marks for style but is actually the result of careful engineering to make laundry day less of a workout. The drum is elevated and angled by an extra 10 degree tilt. Additionally the door opening is angled to match for easier access., 
: Overall, this may not sound like a big difference, but each time you reach for that last sock and move loads from the washer to the dryer to your basket you will be happy LG took the extra step., 
ThinQ Technology: The LG ThinQ app helps you manage your LG Smart appliance and more, all to make your everyday a little easier. Automatically reorder supplies based on actual usage. Start or stop programs on your way home from work., 
: Even get proactive alerts with ThinQ Care to keep your appliance running smoothly—and your home running smarter. Compatible with Alexa and the Google Assistant and available for iOS and Android platforms, this free app will help you run your home like a pro., 
Sensor Dry: No more damp clothes—the built-in sensor detects moisture levels and automatically adjusts drying time for loads of all sizes. No more overdrying—dryer shuts off at just the right time to save energy with less wear and tear on clothes., 
NeveRust Stainless Steel Drum: Just because you want your dryer to last for years doesn’t mean you want it to look its age. The NeveRust Stainless Steel Drum is built to keep drying your clothes more efficiently without showing wear and tear., 
FlowSense Duct Clogging and Lint Filter Indicators: FlowSense Duct Clogging and Lint Filter Indicators tell when ducts and filter need cleaning of lint buildup, improve dryer performance for greater efficiency and lower utility bills, and give safer, worry-free operation with fewer service calls., 
Wrinkle Care Option: When you hate wrinkles but can’t remove clothes as soon as they’re dry, just select the Wrinkle Care option before hitting start. The dryer will periodically tumble the load for up to 3 hours after the cycle is done or until the door is opened to help keep wrinkles at bay., 
Dryer cords are not shipped with the dryer.: It is the responsibility of the consumer to purchase the appropriate cord for their home., 
: ¹Refresh in just 10 minutes up to 5 garments, based on test conducted at LG’s test lab facility in December, 2014.,

Name: Whirlpool - 7 Cu. Ft. Electric Dryer with AutoDry Drying System - White
Description:
Dry clothes efficiently with this 7.0 cu. ft. Whirlpool electric dryer. Its end-of-cycle periodic tumbling option prevents creases and wrinkles, and its three temperature selections and 14 settings handle a variety of loads and fabrics. This 29-inch Whirlpool electric dryer's wide-opening drop-down door keeps freshly laundered items off the floor and simplifies unloading. 
Safely dry all your garments and linens with 1 of 14 cycles: Includes heavy duty, freshen up, wrinkle shield, air fluff and other drying programs., 
Avoid over-drying by provide the proper heat for different fabric types: 3 temperature settings., 
Save time between loads with an end-of-cycle signal: Know exactly when it's time to change your load with an audible signal., 
Front-loading design: For easy access., 
Drum light: Provides a clear view of the dryer's interior., 
Powder coated interior: For durability.,
Product Name: 7 Cu. Ft. Electric Dryer with AutoDry Drying System
Drying Cycles: Heavy duty, freshen up, Wrinkle Shield, air fluff, time dry, automatic, auto dry, low heat drying, energy preferred cycle, less dry, high heat drying, medium, more dry, time dry 30, time dry 40, time dry 50, time dry 60, time dry 20
Options and Programs: Automatic Dry, Energy Preferred, Fluff Dry, Heavy Duty, Less Dry, More Dry, Timed Dry, Damp Dry Signal, Freshen Up, Wrinkle Shield

Name: Whirlpool - 7.4 Cu. Ft. 36-Cycle Electric Dryer - Chrome Shadow
Description:
Match your family's routines and your space with a front load hybrid heat pump dryer that can be installed virtually anywhere, thanks to its ventless design. Dry each load your way in this ENERGY STAR certified dryer with our most efficient full-size dryer technology that recirculates hot air to help conserve energy. 
Wrinkle Shield Option: Help keep wrinkles from setting into clean, dry fabrics with the Wrinkle Shield option. It keeps clothes tumbling for up to 150 minutes after the cycle ends or until you open the door., 
7.4 cu. ft. Capacity: Get plenty of room to dry the large loads you washed in the matching front load washer. This 7.4 cu. ft. dryer easily handles bulky items like comforters and sleeping bags., 
ENERGY STAR Certified: ENERGY STAR certified models exceed government standards to help conserve natural resources and save money on your utility bills., 
Intuitive Controls: Let the dryer guide you to the right cycle combinations or customize up to 36 of your own to get the right type of fabric care for whatever you're drying., 
Advanced Moisture Sensing: Help prevent overdrying. Three sensors track moisture and temperature, adapting drying times to end the cycle at just the right time., 
Eco option: Save energy by gently drying clothes at low temperatures with the Eco option, which recirculates hot air to reduce use of the heater., 
Quad Baffles: Four baffles tumble clothes in a randomized pattern, allowing items to open up freely. This helps increase the effectiveness of the dryer for small loads., 
Stainless Steel Dryer Drum: Clothes are gently cradled as they tumble around the smooth surface of this drum’s stainless steel construction., 
Closet-Depth Fit: Get a space-saving design with closet-depth fit that allows for more flexible installation in your laundry space., 
Flexible installation: Designed to fit a 33" installation depth and with ventless technology, this closet-depth dryer can be installed virtually anywhere., 
Hybrid heat pump drying technology: Dry each load your way with our most efficient full-size dryer technology that recirculates hot air to help conserve energy., 
: Choose the Eco option when you want to save energy with gentle drying at lower temperatures or the Speed option when you need clothes to be ready quickly with help from the heater., 
Laundry Pedestals: Raise your dryer for easier loading and unloading. Optional laundry pedestals also provide space-saving storage for detergent, dryer sheets and other supplies.,
Product Name: 7.4 Cu. Ft. 36-Cycle Electric Dryer
Drying Cycles: Bulky items, colors, delicates, gentle, heavy duty, normal, quick dry, regular, timed dry, towels, whites, wrinkle control
Options and Programs: Control Lock, Cycle Signal, Damp Dry Signal, Eco, Speed, Wrinkle Shield

Name: GE - 7.2 Cu. Ft. Electric Dryer with Spanish Control Panel - White with Matte Black
Description:
At GE Appliances, we bring good things to life, by designing and building some of the world's best appliances. Our goal is to help people improve their lives at home by providing quality appliances that were made for real life. Whether it's enjoying the tradition of making meals from scratch or tackling a mountain of muddy jeans and soccer jerseys, GE Appliances are crafted to support any and every task in the home. 
Spanish Control Panel: Dryer controls in Spanish, matching washer (ETW485ASWWB) sold separately., 
Auto Dry: Auto Dry monitors the internal air temperature to determine the ideal drying time, protecting your garments from overdying., 
Powerful Venting & Flexible Installation: Powerful airflow offers long-lasting performance from lint build-up and offers venting solutions up to 120 feet for greater installation flexibility., 
Extended Tumble: Tumble clothes without heat to prevent creasing and wrinkling with a convenient extended tumble button. This cycle is ideal to help to remove even more pet hair on already-dry items, allowing debris to be caught by your dryer’s lint screen., 
Interior Light: Convenient dryer drum lights provide better visibility to help ensure no small items or socks are left behind, making it easier to load and unload laundry., 
Adjustable Cycle Signal: End of Cycle signal volume is adjustable, ensuring you are alerted to promptly remove your garments before winkles have a chance to form., 
Large Diffuser for Even Drying: A large internal heat diffuser allows for warm air to evenly spread throughout your clothes during the cycle, making this the ideal dryer for large loads and bulky items., 
Durable Aluminized Drum: This durable, long-lasting design resists corrosion and optimizes drying performance., 
Reversible Dryer Door: Door can swing from either direction making it easier to access the last sock from the back of the drum., 
Temperature Selection: Offer a range of drying temperatures to adjust to the specific needs of your garments for personalized garment care., 
Up Front Lint Filter: Simplify the task of lint removal with our convenient upfront lint filter, enhancing airflow within the appliance and for your garments., 
Delicates Cycle: This delicate, low heat dryer setting helps protect fabrics and extends the lifetime of even your most delicate items., 
: Electric cord and vent kit are sold separately and are not included.,
Product Name: 7.2 Cu. Ft. Electric Dryer with Spanish Control Panel
Drying Cycles: Normal, Casuals, Delicates, Timed Dry
Options and Programs: Cool Down, Less Dry, More Dry, Optimum Dry, Towels, Optional Wrinkle Care, Dewrinkle, Quick Fluff
Temperature Settings: Regular, Medium, Low, Air Fluff (No Heat)

Name: Samsung - 7.5 Cu. Ft. Stackable Electric Dryer with Long Vent Drying - White
Description:
Samsung’s 7.5 cu. ft. capacity dryers feature Sensor Dry and 10 preset drying cycles, so you can do fewer loads in less time 
Interior Drum Light: Put an end to stray socks or small items that are hard to spot., 
Flexible opening: Choose the direction your dryer door opens., 
Stop the fluff: The Filter Check Indicator light lets you know when it is time to clean the filter., 
Easier use, for everyone: Designed for easy use for everyone., 
9 Additional Drying Options: Further options to provide optimal care for all fabric types., 
5 Temperature Levels: Ideal temperatures to treat your clothes gently and thoroughly., 
: **(1) The Sensor Dry icon turns on when in use., 
: **(2) Requires Samsung Smart Washer/Dryer App. The Samsung Smart Washer/Dryer App supports Android OS 2.3.6 or later and iOS 3 or later for iPhone models. Samsung Smart Washer/Dryer App available in App Store and Play Store.,

Drying Cycles: Normal, Heavy Duty, Permanent Press, Activewear, Bedding, Delicates, Sanitize, Time Dry, Air Fluff, Quick Dry

Name: Whirlpool - 7.4 Cu. Ft. Electric Dryer with Space Saving Design - White
Description:
Get the capacity of two dryers in the space of one with the Whirlpool commercial stack dryer. With extra-large 7.4 cu. ft. capacity in each drum, this dryer can handle more loads and give laundry facilities the durability and performance needed to withstand the heavy traffic of commercial laundry. The Whirlpool commercial laundry non-coin stack dryer is backed by a 90-day labor and 2-year limited parts only warranty. 
Space-saving design: Maximizing floor space can help get additional washers and dryers on the floor to increase facility productivity. At 7.4 cu. ft. per dryer, this stack option provides double the drying capability while taking up the room of only a single unit., 
Ease of use: Comfortable loading and simple cycle navigation are conveniences that make a difference to any user. With a wide-opening, side-swing door and easy-to-use push button controls, this stack dryer makes getting laundry done an uncomplicated task., 
Super capacity: The 7.4-cu.-ft. super capacity means loads from small to extra-large can be dried efficiently and effectively., 
Four-roller suspension: The commercial-quality four-roller suspension delivers daily, quality drying., 
: 1/3 HP motor with metal pulley, 
: Removable, door-mounted lint screen, 
: Balanced airflow system, 
: Front service accessibility,
Product Name: 7.4 Cu. Ft. Electric Dryer with Space Saving Design
Options and Programs: Whites, Colors, Permanent Press, Delicates

Name: Whirlpool - 7.4 Cu. Ft. 36-Cycle Electric Dryer with Steam - White
Description:
Stay in control and connected from anywhere with a smart front load dryer and the Whirlpool app.* It includes a dryer rack that attaches inside the stainless steel drum for tumble-free drying of bulky or delicate items. When drying ends, the ENERGY STAR certified electric dryer's Wrinkle Shield Plus option with Steam helps release and prevent wrinkles. 
Wrinkle Shield Plus Option with Steam: Help keep wrinkles from setting into clean, dry fabrics. The Wrinkle Shield Plus option with Steam uses tumbling and steam for up to 150 minutes after the cycle ends or until you open the dryer door for improved wrinkle-fighting performance., 
Smart Appliance: Care for your family from your smartphone or tablet. (Appliance must be set to remote enable. WiFi & App required. Features subject to change. Details and privacy info at whirlpool.com/connect.), 
Remote Control with the Whirlpool App: Stay connected from anywhere. The Whirlpool app lets you set, start or pause the cycle. (Must be set to remote enable. WiFi & App Required. Subject to change. Details & privacy at whirlpool.com/connect.)(Available on select cycles. Compatible washer required.), 
7.4 cu. ft. Capacity: Get plenty of room to dry the large loads you washed in the matching front load washer. This 7.4 cu. ft. dryer easily handles bulky items like comforters and sleeping bags., 
Match Washer Cycle with Dryer Cycle: Get the right kind of dry for your load. The Whirlpool app will suggest the dry cycle that matches the wash cycle. (Available on select cycles. Compatible washer required. WiFi & App Required. Subject to change. Details & privacy at whirlpool.com/connect.), 
ENERGY STAR Certified: ENERGY STAR certified models exceed government standards to help conserve natural resources and save money on your utility bills., 
Intuitive Controls: Let the dryer guide you to the right cycle combinations or customize up to 36 of your own to get the right type of fabric care for whatever you're drying., 
Touchscreen: Get instant access to the settings you use most with an intuitive touchscreen that learns, adapts and suggests customized presets based on your family's routines. Create and save up to 30 of your own favorite cycles for even more customized care., 
Steam Refresh Cycle: Release wrinkles and reduce odors with the Steam Refresh cycle. It uses water and heat to get clothes ready to wear without rewashing., 
Sanitize Cycle: The Sanitize cycle provides care for your clothes in the dryer while eliminating 99.9% of common household bacteria. (Bacteria tested were K. pneumoniae, P. aeruginosa, S. aureus.), 
Static Reduce Option: Help decrease static with the Static Reduce option, which combines a spray of mist with tumbling after the load is dry., 
EcoBoost Option: Use less energy while getting great drying performance with the EcoBoost option. This option saves energy by using less heat and an extended cycle time. (Savings may vary by load type.), 
Quad Baffles: Four baffles tumble clothes in a randomized pattern, allowing items to open up freely. This helps increase the effectiveness of the dryer for small loads., 
Stainless Steel Dryer Drum: Clothes are gently cradled as they tumble around the smooth surface of this drum’s stainless steel construction., 
Dryer rack: Place unique or delicate items like sweaters, pillows, hats and tennis shoes on the Dryer Rack for tumble-free drying. This rack attaches inside the drum and stays in one place throughout the cycle. Rack ships separately after online product registration., 
Closet-Depth Fit: Get a space-saving design with closet-depth fit that allows for more flexible installation in your laundry space. (Designed to fit a 33" installation depth.), 
Assign a Task: Manage laundry day from anywhere by assigning family members the next laundry step from the Whirlpool app. Send messages for transferring a load to the dryer or folding clean clothes. (WiFi & App Required. Subject to change. Details & privacy at whirlpool.com/connect.), 
Scan-to-Connect Technology: You don't need to be a tech expert to connect your new appliance. Simply open the Whirlpool app, add your appliance and follow the guided experience. (Must be set to remote enable. WiFi & App required. Subject to change. Details & privacy at whirlpool.com/connect.), 
Voice Control with a Compatible Voice-Enabled Device (U.S. only.): Keep up with laundry with simple voice commands using a compatible voice-enabled device. (Must be set to remote enable. WiFi & App Required. Subject to change. Details & privacy at whirlpool.com/connect.), 
Personalized Quick Tips: The Whirlpool app delivers quick tips to make sure your family’s laundry gets the care it deserves while helping laundry day go more smoothly. (WiFi & App Required. Subject to change. Details & privacy at whirlpool.com/connect.), 
Favorite Cycles: Save your favorite cycles and access Favorite Cycles from the Whirlpool app to send laundry cycles to your dryer and start the load remotely. (Must be set to remote enable. WiFi & App Required. Subject to change. Details & privacy at whirlpool.com/connect.), 
Enhanced Troubleshooting: Get immediate support for quick solutions by using your smartphone or tablet to access troubleshooting videos within the Whirlpool app. (WiFi & App Required. Subject to change. Details & privacy at whirlpool.com/connect.), 
Control Lock Mode: Use your smartphone or tablet to remotely disable the control panel to avoid unintended use. (Must be set to remote enable. WiFi & App required. Subject to change. Details & privacy at whirlpool.com/connect.), 
Smart Grid Compatible: Helps you reduce household energy costs. Use Smart Delay in the Whirlpool app to avoid running during peak hours. (Not available in all locations. Must be set to remote enable. WiFi & App Required. Subject to change. Details & privacy at whirlpool.com/connect.),

Name: Black+Decker - 2.65 Cu.Ft. Stackable Smart Electric Dryer with Standard Wall Outlet - White
Description:
Clean, dry clothes are no longer a luxury for larger homes and buildings. This compact, 2.65 Cu. Ft. dryer is ideal for smaller spaces and apartments, as it comes with a 4-inch vent hose and an exhaust connector, along with lint and exhauster filters. It also connects to any standard outlet with a 3-prong plug and has adjustable leveling legs for easier set up. This portable dryer also comes with overheat protection and Sensor Dry, enabling the dryer to measure the moisture level and dry your clothes accordingly. 
Sensor dry function: Measures moisture and automatically adjusts the heat for more efficient drying performance., 
ECO mode: Saves energy by beginning the drying cycle with cool air and changing to hot air setting., 
Compact and powerful: This Dryer dimensions of 23.6” x 17.1” x 27.5”, weight of 48.4 lbs. It can be installed in smaller rooms, spaces, and apartments. Stainless steel drum with front loading transparent lid. Holds up to 8.8 lbs. of laundry. Drying times: 30-200 minutes., 
Compatible with most washers: Most compatible with washers BPWH84W, BPWM09W, BPWM16W, BPWM20W, BPWM30W and BFLW27MW., 
Disclaimer: Electric cord included, But vent kit is separately and is not included.,
Product Name: 2.65 Cu.Ft. Stackable Smart Electric Dryer with Standard Wall Outlet
Temperature Settings: Air Dry, Cool, Warm and Hot settings

Name: Samsung - BESPOKE 7.6 Cu. Ft. Stackable Smart Electric Dryer with Steam and AI Optimal Dry - Silver Steel
Description:
Samsung’s Bespoke Ultra Capacity Electric Dryer has a sleek, flat-panel design, comes in new premium colors, and is equipped with smart features that simplify your laundry experience. It has our AI Optimal Dry, which automatically chooses the best settings based on what you're drying, to take the guesswork out of cycle selection, and Super Speed Dry, which optimally dries a full load in just 30 minutes. 
Bespoke design, intelligent dry: Laundry reimagined with a clean, flat-panel design and AI-powered features that simplify your cleaning routine. Choose from a variety of premium colors to create a laundry space that fits your style., 
AI Optimal Dry: Our AI Optimal Dry cycle automatically chooses the best time and temperature settings based on what you're drying,¹ taking guesswork out of cycle selection, 
Super Speed Dry: Dry a full load in just 30 minutes² and achieve a complete wash and dry in under an hour with an added Super Speed Washer, 
AI Smart Dial: Samsung’s easy to use, AI Smart Dial simplifies your dryer’s control panel, learns and recommends your favorite cycles, and allows you to customize your cycle list, making laundry day a breeze, 
MultiControl: Eliminate the long reach and control your dryer right from your washer when the units are stacked.,

Description:

A stainless steel dryer drum gently cradles clothes as they tumble. When drying ends, the ENERGY STAR certified electric dryer's steam cycles help release and prevent wrinkles. 
7.4 cu. ft. Capacity: Get plenty of room to dry the large loads you washed in the matching front load washer. This 7.4 cu. ft. dryer easily handles bulky items like comforters and sleeping bags., 
ENERGY STAR Certified: ENERGY STAR certified models exceed government standards to help conserve natural resources and save money on your utility bills., 
Intuitive Controls: Let the dryer guide you to the right cycle combinations or customize up to 36 of your own to get the right type of fabric care for whatever you're drying., 
Wrinkle Shield Plus Option with Steam: Help keep wrinkles from setting into clean, dry fabrics. The Wrinkle Shield Plus option with Steam uses tumbling and steam for up to 150 minutes after the cycle ends or until you open the dryer door for improved wrinkle-fighting performance., 
Steam Refresh Cycle: Release wrinkles and reduce odors with the Steam Refresh cycle. It uses water and heat to get clothes ready to wear without rewashing., 
Sanitize Cycle: The Sanitize cycle provides care for your clothes in the dryer while eliminating 99.9% of common household bacteria. (Bacteria tested were K. pneumoniae, P. aeruginosa, S. aureus.), 
Static Reduce Option: Help decrease static with the Static Reduce option, which combines a spray of mist with tumbling after the load is dry., 
EcoBoost Option: Use less energy while getting great drying performance with the EcoBoost option. This option saves energy by using less heat and an extended cycle time. (Savings may vary by load type.), 
Quad Baffles: Four baffles tumble clothes in a randomized pattern, allowing items to open up freely. This helps increase the effectiveness of the dryer for small loads., 
Stainless Steel Dryer Drum: Clothes are gently cradled as they tumble around the smooth surface of this drum’s stainless steel construction., 
Dryer Rack: Place unique or delicate items like sweaters, pillows, hats and tennis shoes on the Dryer Rack for tumble-free drying. This rack attaches inside the drum and stays in one place throughout the cycle. Rack ships separately after online product registration. Valid email address required., 
Closet-Depth Fit: Get a space-saving design with closet-depth fit that allows for more flexible installation in your laundry space. (Designed to fit a 33" installation depth.), 
Laundry Pedestals: Raise your dryer for easier loading and unloading. Optional laundry pedestals also provide space-saving storage for detergent, dryer sheets and other supplies. (Sold separately.),

Name: Maytag - 7.4 Cu. Ft. Smart Electric Dryer with Steam and Extra Power Button - White
Description:
One push of the Extra Power button on Maytag heavy-duty dryers boosts drying power on any cycle by extending time, heat, and tumbling. Commercial-grade dryer technology ensures it's built to last, while optional smart electric dryer features such as remote start and cycle notifications help you stay in control and efficiently manage laundry from anywhere. 
Extra Power: Extra Power boosts drying power to get thick fabrics drier the first time.¹, 
Wrinkle Prevent Option with Steam: With the Wrinkle Prevent option with Steam, the dryer tumbles your clothes with steam for up to 150 minutes after the cycle has ended to keep wrinkles at bay., 
ENERGY STAR Certified: ENERGY STAR certified models exceed government standards to help conserve natural resources and save money on your utility bills., 
Reduce Static Option: The Reduce Static option cuts down on cling with the addition of a fine mist of water as clothes tumble at the end of the cycle., 
Steam Refresh Cycle: Built to reduce wrinkles, the Steam Refresh cycle quickly revives clothes without the need for a full wash cycle., 
Hamper Door: Sweep laundry onto the open hamper door to keep it off the floor. The latch-free door drops down, giving you a chute for loading and a sturdy platform for unloading, folding and stacking., 
Cycle Notifications: Finished loads won't be left behind with the Maytag app.² Get end of cycle notification on your smartphone with the option to Assign a Task to family members to keep laundry moving., 
10-year Limited Parts Warranty: We don’t just tell you a Maytag dryer will get your clothes dry for years: we confidently back our dryers with a 10-year limited parts warranty* on the drive motor and drum., 
Quick Dry Cycle: The Quick Dry cycle dries small loads fast. Clothes will be ready before you know it when paired with the Quick Wash cycle., 
Remote Start: Do laundry anywhere, anytime with your smartphone.² Set cycles with the option to choose from customized favorites, only available in the Maytag app, then start and stop the cycle remotely., 
Troubleshoot: Troubleshoot select issues without a service call. The Maytag app sends notifications of appliance error codes to help you diagnose the error and videos of select issues walk you through steps to solve the problem.², 
Assign a Task: Manage laundry from anywhere by assigning tasks to family members like transferring a load to the dryer or folding clean clothes through customized text messages. ², 
Match Washer and Dryer Cycle: Get the best dry for your clothes without the guesswork. With the Maytag app, receive a recommended dry cycle that matches your last wash cycle, then send the cycle to your dryer.², 
Smart Tips: Personalized Smart Tips based on your laundry activity help you best clean your laundry and effectively use your Maytag appliances.², 
Favorites: Create customized cycles and save them in the Maytag app. Instantly access Favorites from the app and send them to your washer or dryer to start the load remotely. ², 
American Pride: We take pride in building strong, reliable appliances for your home. These dryers are proudly assembled by hard-working employees in Marion, Ohio., 
Heavy-duty hinges: Heavy-duty door hinges are built tough for years of reliable opening and closing., 
Wrinkle Control Cycle: The Wrinkle Control cycle uses lower temperatures and defaults to using the Wrinkle Prevent option to help minimize wrinkles., 
Maytag Commercial Technology: Maytag Commercial Technology ensures our dryers are built to last, coming standard with a durable motor and the dryer drum backed by a 10-year limited parts warranty., 
: ¹ Results may vary based on load size and type.,

Description:
Get the capacity of two dryers in the space of one with the Whirlpool commercial stack dryer. With extra-large 7.4 cu. ft. capacity in each drum, this dryer can handle more loads and give laundry facilities the durability and performance needed to withstand the heavy traffic of commercial laundry. The Whirlpool commercial laundry stack dryer is coin-drop-equipped and backed by a 90-day labor and 2-year limited parts only warranty. 
Space-saving design: Maximizing floor space can help get additional washers and dryers on the floor to increase facility productivity. At 7.4 cu. ft. per dryer, this stack option provides double the drying capability while taking up the room of only a single unit., 
Factory-installed coin drop and coin box: A robust coin drop and coin box come installed from the factory. The coin drop allows flexibility in pricing your machines for your market.,

Four-roller suspension: The commercial-quality four-roller suspension delivers daily, quality drying.,

Name: Samsung - Open Box 4.0 Cu. Ft. Stackable Smart Electric Dryer with Ventless Heat Pump - White
Description:
Samsung's 4.0 cu. ft. Large Capacity Heat Pump Dryer gives you a ventless, more energy-efficient, cost-effective and gentle way to dry your clothes. It is equipped with our AI Smart Dial, which learns and recommends your favorite cycles and simplifies the control panel to make controlling your dryer a breeze. It is also Wi-Fi Connected, so you can get end of cycle alerts, remotely start, schedule and more from your smartphone with the SmartThings App. 
Heat Pump Technology: Heat Pump Technology offers a more energy-efficient, cost-effective and gentle way to dry your clothes. Plus, its ventless design allows for simple installation in a variety of places., 
ENERGY STAR® Certified: ENERGY STAR® Certified,¹ so you use less energy without sacrificing performance or functionality., 
AI Smart Dial: Samsung’s easy to use, AI Smart Dial simplifies your dryer’s control panel, learns and recommends your favorite cycles,² and allows you to customize your cycle list, making laundry day a breeze., 
Wi-Fi Connectivity: Wi-Fi connected so you can get end-of-cycle alerts, remotely start and stop your dryer, schedule cycles on your time, and more right from your smartphone with the SmartThings App.³, 
Sensor Dry: Automatically optimizes the time and temperature of your drying cycle to protect your clothes from heat damage, while avoiding excess energy use., 
Large 4.0 cu. ft. Capacity: Conveniently designed to fit your space without sacrificing capacity., 
Closet-Depth Fit: With its compact profile, this dryer is designed for easy closet installation, without sacrificing capacity.⁴, 
Lint Filter Indicator: Worry less about lint or fluff blocking the dryer's air intake. The control panel provides a helpful reminder to clean the filter to keep your dryer running smoothly., 
Stainless Steel Drum: Keep your dryer looking like new with a durable stainless steel drum that helps prevent nicks and scratches., 
Internal Drum Light: An internal drum light lets you see the contents of your dryer more clearly, meaning fewer missed socks or small items., 
Flexible Installation: Install your washer and dryer stacked or side by side to fit any space., 
Reversible Dryer Door: Choose which way your dryer door opens to better suit your laundry room layout., 
Matching Washer: Samsung washers and dryers team up to make light work of laundry day.,

Name: Electrolux - Laundry Tower Single Unit Front Load 4.4 Cu. Ft. Washer & 8 Cu. Ft. Electric Dryer - White
Description:
The Laundry Tower Single Unit Front Load 4.4 Cu. Ft. Washer & 8 Cu. Ft. Electric Dryer is a full-size and fully integrated front load Laundry Tower featuring a stacked design that takes up half the floor space, freeing up the laundry room for extra storage, all with an easy to reach control panel. The washer features LuxCare Wash that provides a thorough clean to clothes and fabrics, plus 15 minute fast wash and fast dry. 
Vertical stacked design that gives you back space: Fully integrated vertical layout takes up half the floor space of a traditional washer/dryer for greater laundry room flexibility. Features a full-sized washer on bottom, a full-sized dryer on the top, and a control panel in the middle for easy access., 
Thorough cleaning with the unique LuxCare Wash System: Improved wash actions, temperature control, and smart load sensing combine to ensure a thorough clean., 
15-Minute fast wash & 15-minute fast dry: Just 30 minutes for a wash and dry--quickly deep cleans and dries the items you need most., 
Extra large capacity: Easily clean large loads and even a king-sized comforter with extra large capacity (4.4 cu. ft. in the washer and 8.0 cu. Ft. in the dryer)., 
Keeps clothes looking their best without over drying: Clothes are gently tumbled while moisture sensors detect when clothes are dry to prevent over-drying., 
ENERGY STAR Certified: Electrolux washers and dryers meet strict criteria to guarantee high-quality energy efficient performance--without sacrificing clean., 
Extended refresh: Adds a rinse and spin after the wash cycle to keep garments fresh until you can switch them to the dryer., 
Extended tumble option keeps clothes tangle-free: Gently tumbles your clothes without heat to keep them tangle-free--perfect for when you cannot remove clothes right after the cycle ends., 
Reversible doors: Enjoy easy loading and unloading no matter where you place your Laundry Tower, even if it's next to a wall or in a corner, 
LuxCare lint shield helps avoid messes: Traps lint so it doesn’t make a mess, even if you empty it while there are clothes in the dryer.,
Product Name: Laundry Tower Single Unit Front Load 4.4 Cu. Ft. Washer & 8 Cu. Ft. Electric Dryer

Name: LG - 5.0 Cu. Ft. HE Smart Front Load Washer and 7.8 Cu. Ft. Electric Dryer WashTower with Steam and Ventless Heat Pump Tech - White
Description:
The one-of-a-kind LG WashTower now has a ventless dryer for flexible installation and greater energy savings—using up to 65% less energy to dry every load¹. But it’s still loaded with all of the features that put it at the top of everyone’s “it” list. The single unit design takes up half the space² with an easy reach Center Control LCD panel that delivers everything from helpful prompts to status updates to remaining cycle time. Built-in intelligence makes laundry less of a chore by taking out the guesswork, while top-of-the-line innovations put advanced cleaning power within reach. 
Mega Capacity 5.0 cu.ft. Washer and 7.8 cu.ft. Dryer (WashTower): Say never again to never-ending piles of laundry—mega capacity fits more clothes in every load and helps you power through laundry day in less time. With 5.0 cu. ft. in the washer and 7.8 cu. ft. in the dryer, you can fit big loads of towels or jeans to a king-size comforter and more in a single load, for big time savings every week., 
Single Unit WashTower Design: This vertical laundry solution puts everything within reach. Full-size capacity and features in half the space², and a centralized control panel for the easiest access ever. The ventless design on the dryer offers greater flexibility for more installation options., 
Dual Inverter HeatPump Technology: Meet a more modern approach to drying. LG's Dual Inverter HeatPump technology uses up to 65% less energy to dry every load.³ Not only does this ENERGY STAR certified dryer feature LG’s most energy efficient ventless drying system, the low temperatures are easier on clothes and can help them look their best for longer. And with no need for venting, this dryer is easy to install and is virtually maintenance free., 
Inverter Direct Drive Motor System: When it comes to powerful, reliable performance, there’s just no comparison. Featuring LG's exclusive Direct Drive Motor System, this ventless vertical laundry solution provides even washing and drying performance and precise tumbling motions that are extra kind to delicates. Enjoy quiet operation and greater energy efficiency than belt-driven motors—no belts, no pulleys, no worries. What else can you count on? The peace of mind of a 10-year limited warranty., 
ThinQ Care: The ThinQ app offers control and convenience to help you simplify life and enjoy the comforts of home. Control your washer/dryer combo remotely or use voice commands with Google or Alexa voice assistants. Plus, download additional cycles and access Smart Diagnosis, customer support, and more., 
Built-In Intelligence: AI Fabric Sensors / Infrared Sensor / Smart Pairing: Built-in intelligence takes out the guesswork—AI technology selects optimal wash and dry motions and settings. Washer can auto-select a compatible drying cycle., 
Advanced Washing: TurboWash 360°: From mega capacity to top-of-the-line innovations, the LG WashTower delivers the advanced cleaning performance you need. TurboWash 360° powers through larger loads in less time, thanks to five jets with variable sprays that deliver a complete clean in under 30 minutes⁴., 
Auto Cleaning Condenser: Unlike some dryers that require manual cleaning of the condenser for optimal performance, LG’s Auto Cleaning Condenser does the work for you. Using water extracted during the drying cycle, it powerfully flushes away lint and debris every time you dry for better airflow, better drying and enhanced energy efficiency—automatically., 
ThinQ UP: ThinQ UP enabled smart appliances receive continual software updates for new downloadable features and enhancements sent wirelessly to the appliance. Choose which features you want and customize your appliance based on your lifestyle and personal preferences., 
ThinQ Care: Available within the ThinQ app, ThinQ Care sends proactive usage, maintenance, and diagnostic alerts to your smartphone to help keep your LG smart appliances running smoothly., 
Tempered Glass Doors with Chrome Rim: LG WashTower uses tempered glass doors for a sleek, stylish look that resists shock and scratches. Chrome rim complements the doors and enhances the premium feel., 
NeveRust Stainless Steel Tubs: Unlike tubs made from porcelain or plastic, the LG NeveRust Stainless Steel Tubs avoid the chips and nicks that can snag fabrics and ruin clothing. Durable surface actually gets smoother over time and keeps your washer and dryer looking like new, even after years of use., 
Tub Clean System: With the LG Tub Clean system, you don’t have to worry about mold, mildew or musty odors. Simply select the Tub Clean cycle, add liquid bleach or other cleaner and let the washer do the work to thoroughly clean and dry the tub, door and gaskets. Run it every month or so to keep your washer—and your laundry—clean and fresh., 
TrueBalance Anti-Vibration System: Noisy, out-of-balance loads can disrupt your laundry routine—and your day. LG helps you wash in peace with the TrueBalance anti-vibration system that keeps even big loads in balance to reduce washer noise and vibration. A must-have for main-floor or second-floor laundry rooms., 
LoDecibel Quiet Operation: Run the washer or dryer whenever you want, without interrupting naptime or your favorite show. The LG WashTower is designed for quiet operation, from the motor to the cabinet to individual components., 
Wrinkle Care Option: When you hate wrinkles but can’t be there to remove clothes as soon as they’re dry, just select the Wrinkle Care option before hitting start. The dryer will periodically tumble the load for up to 3 hours after the cycle is done or until the door is opened to help keep wrinkles at bay., 
: ¹When compared with conventional vented dryer DLE3400, based on Intertek testing in normal cycle with Energy Saver option, 8.45 lb. load with 57.5% initial moisture content (September 2023), 
: ²Half the functional floor space, 
: ³When compared with conventional vented dryer DLE3400, based on Intertek testing in normal cycle with Energy Saver option, 8.45 lb. load with 57.5% initial moisture content (September 2023), 
: ⁴Based on independent testing of a comparable model in normal cycle with TurboWash Option, 10 lb. load (October 2023),

Name: LG - 2.4 Cu. Ft. High-Efficiency Smart Front Load Washer and Electric Dryer Combo with Steam and Sensor Dry - Graphite Steel
Description:
This compact all-in-one combo delivers advanced LG washing and drying performance in the space of a single appliance. Take out the guesswork with built-in intelligence in the wash cycle and Sensor Dry that automatically adjust settings for advanced fabric care. Reduce allergens, such as dust, pollen and pet dander, in everything from bedding to baby clothes with the steam-powered Allergiene cycle. Even start laundry on the go with built-in wi-fi and the ThinQ app. All wrapped in a stylish new design that includes a tempered glass door with chrome trim. 
2.4 cu.ft. Compact Capacity: At 2.4 cubic feet, this washer/dryer combo unit has plenty of capacity to get the job done, with a compact size and closet depth design that fits almost anywhere., 
: Slide it under an existing countertop or install it in a second floor laundry room closet, for easy access that tucks neatly behind closed doors when you’re done., 
Built-In Intelligence: Forget about endless sorting or toggling through cycles—built-in sensors use AI technology to detect fabric texture and load size, then automatically select the right wash motions, temperatures and more for advanced fabric care., 
ThinQ Care: Keep your appliances running smoothly with ThinQ Care, now in the ThinQ app. Get notifications about usage, maintenance, plus early diagnosis right on your phone. ThinQ Care will help you understand your appliance needs, avoid potential problems, and keep your appliance running its best., 
ThinQ Technology: Use the ThinQ app to start the laundry while you’re out shopping, check remaining cycle time or get notifications on your smartphone. Go hands-free—select features work with Alexa and Google Assistant. Never run out of detergent and dryer sheets again—, 
: Amazon Dash Replenishment Service tracks usage and automatically delivers your favorite detergent and dryer sheets right to your door. ThinQ Care offers preventative maintenance tips and alerts and expedited repairs, for enhanced satisfaction plus improved product performance., 
AAFA Certified LG Washer: Reduce common household allergens such as dust, pet dander and pollen in fabrics by more than 95%¹. Certified asthma & allergy friendly by the Asthma and Allergy Foundation of America (AAFA)²—LG washers are the first to earn this distinction., 
: Breathe easier with the Allergiene cycle that uses the gentle power of steam to remove dust, pet dander and pollen from bedding, baby clothes and more. A proven tool for creating a healthier home—perfect for the more than 65 million Americans living with asthma and allergies., 
Ventless Condensing Drying: No access to external venting? No problem. LG’s all-in-one washer/dryers use ventless condensing to dry your clothes without the need for external venting., 
Sensor Dry: No more damp clothes—the built-in sensor detects moisture levels and automatically adjusts drying time for loads of all sizes. No more overdrying—dryer shuts off at just the right time to save energy with less wear and tear on clothes., 
Tempered Glass Door with Chrome Trim: LG front load washers and dryers are the first to use tempered glass doors for a sleek, stylish look that resists shock and scratches. Chrome rim and matching control knob complement the door and enhance the premium feel., 
Direct Drive Motor 10-Year Limited Warranty: Backed by a 10-year limited warranty, the LG Direct Drive Motor delivers peace of mind with every load. Fewer moving parts means less noise and vibration, greater stability and durable performance you can depend on for years to come., 
NeveRust Stainless Steel Tub: Unlike porcelain or plastic tubs, the LG NeveRust Stainless Steel Tub avoids the chips and nicks that can snag fabrics and ruin clothing. Durable surface actually gets smoother over time and keeps your washer/dryer looking like new, even after years of use., 
TrueBalance Anti-Vibration System and LoDecibel Quiet Operation: Run the washer when you want— LG 's TrueBalance Anti-Vibration and LoDecibel systems are designed for quiet operation to keep even big loads balanced to reduce noise and vibration. A must-have for main- or 2nd floor laundry rooms., 
TubClean Cycle: The TubClean Cycle is designed for easy, periodic maintenance to keep your washer fresh. The cycle uses water jets to clean the wash tub and door, and an air dryer removes excess moisture, helping to keep your high-performing washer in tip-top condition., 
SmartDiagnosis: If you ever experience an issue with your LG washer or dryer, you don't have to worry. The SmartDiagnosis feature helps the service center diagnose problems over the phone, or with a simple app on your smart phone, helping you minimize costly, inconvenient service calls.³, 
Wrinkle Care Option: When you can’t be there to remove clothes as soon as they’re dry, just select the Wrinkle Care option before hitting start. The dryer will periodically tumble the load for up to 3 hours after the cycle is done or until the door is opened to help keep wrinkles at bay., 
SpeedWash Cycle: Let's face it: Sometimes, you just don't have time to wait for a standard wash cycle. When your're in a rush, LG's SpeedWash Cycle gets small lightly soiled loads refreshed in just 15 minutes., 
: Dryer cords are not shipped with the dryer. It is the responsibility of the consumer to purchase the appropriate cord for their home., 
: ¹Based on certification by the Asthma and Allergy Foundation of America (AAFA), 
: ²Asthma and Allergy Friendly mark is a Registered Trade Mark of the Asthma and Allergy Foundation of America and Allergy Standards Ltd., 
: ³SmartDiagnosis is designed to supplement existing methods of problem identification and may not be able to troubleshoot all issues.,
