Name: Samsung - BESPOKE 7.5 cu. ft. Large Capacity Electric Dryer with Super Speed Dry and AI Smart Dial - Brushed Black
Description:
Samsung’s Bespoke Large Capacity Electric Dryer has a sleek, flat-panel design, comes in new premium colors, and is equipped with smart features that simplify your laundry experience. It has our Super Speed Dry, which optimally dries a full load in just 30 minutes, and our AI Smart Dial, which learns and recommends your favorite cycles and makes controlling your dryer a breeze. 
Bespoke design, intelligent dry: Laundry reimagined with a clean, flat-panel design and AI-powered features that simplify your cleaning routine. Choose from a variety of premium colors to create a laundry space that fits your style., 
Super Speed Dry: Dry a full load in just 30 minutes¹ and achieve a complete wash and dry in under an hour with an added Super Speed Washer, 
AI Smart Dial: Samsung’s easy to use, AI Smart Dial simplifies your dryer’s control panel, learns and recommends your favorite cycles,² and allows you to customize your cycle list, making laundry day a breeze, 
MultiControl: Eliminate the long reach and control your dryer right from your washer when the units are stacked³, 
Steam Sanitize+: Our Steam Sanitize+ cycle removes 95% of pollen⁴ from fabric, while Multi-Steam refreshes clothing and relaxes light wrinkles, 
ENERGY STAR Certified: ENERGY STAR Certified,⁵ so you use less energy without sacrificing performance or functionality, 
Shallow Closet-Depth Fit: Perfect for any laundry space, this dryer has a shallower depth for easy closet installation, without sacrificing capacity., 
Flexible Installation: Install your washer and dryer stacked or side by side to fit any space., 
Wi-Fi Connectivity: Wi-Fi connected so you can get end-of-cycle alerts, remotely start and stop your dryer, schedule cycles on your time, and more right from your smartphone with the SmartThings App., 
Sensor Dry: Automatically optimizes the time and temperature of your drying cycle to protect your clothes from heat damage, while avoiding excess energy use., 
7.5 cu. ft. Ultra Capacity: Fewer loads, less time in the laundry room, and more time doing the things you love., 
Vent Sensor: A sensor continuously monitors the condition of your dryer's air duct to make sure it’s running safely and efficiently. Plus, automatic alerts let you know when it’s time to clean your air duct or check for obstructions so performance stays at its peak., 
Lint Filter Indicator: Worry less about lint or fluff blocking the dryer's air intake. The control panel provides a helpful reminder to clean the filter to keep your dryer running smoothly., 
Premium Tempered Glass Door: Made with a more scratch-resistant, flat tempered glass, our premium design door combines an upscale look with a durable finish., 
Internal Drum Light: An internal drum light lets you see the contents of your dryer more clearly, meaning fewer missed socks or small items., 
Reversible Dryer Door: Choose which way your dryer door opens to better suit your laundry room layout., 
ADA Compliant: With use of a Samsung Riser, your washer or dryer is compliant with the Americans with Disabilities Act (ADA), making loading and unloading much easier., 
Matching Washer: Samsung washers and dryers team up to make light work of laundry day., 
Matching Accessories: Round out your laundry setup with a matching pedestal, riser, and more., 
: ¹Based on 8lb D.O.E. standard load (50% cotton, 50% poly)., 
: ²AI Smart Dial makes recommendations within 30 days of use based on cycle selections, time selected, and other factors., 
: ³Use of this feature requires a stacked AI Smart Dial washer and dryer and Bespoke Stacking & MultiControl Combo Kit (SKK-9MC*), which is sold separately, 
: ⁴Testing based on Samsung internal protocols. Results provided to and interpreted by Intertek. Individual results may vary. ⁵Visit www.energystar.gov for more information on ENERGY STAR guidelines.,

Name: Asko 4.1 cu. ft. Stackable Electric Dryer with Butterfly Drying System, Soft Drum Technology, 9 Drying Programs - White
Description:
24 Inch Electric Dryer with 4.1 cu. ft. Capacity, Butterfly Drying System, Soft Drum Technology, 9 Drying Programs, Anti-Crease Mode, and Delay Start 
Soft Drum: Soft Drum is a solution developed to enhance air flow around the load, thereby increasing the drying effect. The circular indentations with bevelled edges also have a cushioning effect that reduces wear and tear on fabrics. The new drum design allows for even and gentle drying with both small and large loads., 
Butterfly Drying: This smart feature is our own invention. It saves both the motor and your ironing board. The unique paddles inside the drum tumble the clothes in a figure eight to prevent the clothes from bundling. This leads to a reduced need to reverse the drum rotation. This is an intelligent function which saves the motor and the belt from any unnecessary strain and your clothes from creasing., 
Multi Filter System: The Multi Filter System effectively traps all lint before reaching more sensitive parts of the tumble dryer. This keeps the drying times shorter and the machine up and running., 
Sensi dry: The ASKO Sensi Dry system measures moisture in and around the machine, which prevents unnecessary over-drying as well as wear and tear on your clothes., 
Stainless Steel Drum: At ASKO, we believe not only that stainless steel will outlast for example, plastic, but also that quality materials will always look better in years to come. Eventually, galvanised steel rusts, so we decided to make our drums out of stainless steel. That’s why our tumble dryers really do last longer.,

Lint Filter Indicator: Worry less about lint or fluff blocking the dryer's air intake. The control panel provides a helpful reminder to clean the filter to keep your dryer running smoothly., 
Stainless Steel Drum: Keep your dryer looking like new with a durable stainless steel drum that helps prevent nicks and scratches., 
Premium Tempered Glass Door: Made with a more scratch-resistant, flat tempered glass, our premium design door combines an upscale look with a durable finish., 
Internal Drum Light: An internal drum light lets you see the contents of your dryer more clearly, meaning fewer missed socks or small items., 
Drying Rack: The included drying rack provides a perfect place to gently dry delicate items, sweaters and footwear., 
Reversible Dryer Door: Choose which way your dryer door opens to better suit your laundry room layout., 
ADA Compliant: With use of a Samsung Riser, your washer or dryer is compliant with the Americans with Disabilities Act (ADA), making loading and unloading much easier., 
Matching Washer: Samsung washers and dryers team up to make light work of laundry day, 
Matching Accessories: Round out your laundry setup with a matching pedestal, riser, and more.,

Name: Electrolux - Laundry Tower Single Unit Front Load 4.5 Cu. Ft. Washer & 8 Cu. Ft. Electric Dryer - White
Description:
Laundry Tower Single Unit Front Load 4.5 Cu. Ft. Washer & 8 Cu. Ft. Electric Dryer is a full-size and fully integrated unit featuring a stacked design that takes up half the floor space, freeing up the laundry room for extra storage, all with an easy to reach control panel. The washer provides the most effective stain removal with SmartBoost premixing technology* and the dryer with LuxCare Dry uses an moisture sensor to prevent over or under-drying. 
Vertical stacked design that gives you back space: Fully integrated vertical layout takes up half the floor space of a traditional washer/dryer for greater laundry room flexibility, or to fit easily into most closets and other tight spaces. Features a full-sized washer on bottom, a full-sized dryer on the top, and a control panel in the middle for easy access., 
The most effective stain-removing washer with SmartBoost: Unlike other washers, Electrolux's SmartBoost technology premixes water and detergent before the cycle begins, maximizing the cleaning power of the detergent, so stains come out and clothing has a longer life., 
Get a more precise dry with Electrolux's LuxCare Dry System: Save time and energy and protect items from over- or under-drying with a sensor that detects humidity on the surface so that all your fabrics are treated with precision and care, 
Optic Whites cycle keeps whites whiter than bleach: Keep your white clothing and linens looking newer longer with Electrolux's Optic Whites cycle, which prevents the redeposit of dirt and other residues, keeping whites even whiter than the normal cycle with bleach., 
Instant Refresh cycle revives fabrics without washing: Save water and energy with the Instant Refresh dryer cycle, which removes wrinkles and refreshes items from light wear in 10 minutes, without having to do a full wash, 
15-minute fast wash & 15-minute fast dry: Just 30 minutes for a wash and dry--quickly deep cleans and dries the items you need most., 
Extra large capacity: Easily clean large loads and even a king-sized comforter with extra large capacity (4.5 cu. ft. in the washer and 8.0 cu. Ft. in the dryer)., 
Remove bacteria with the Sanitize washer setting: Certified to kill and remove 99% of bacteria., 
Predictive Dry more accurately predicts dry times: Accurately predicts the dry time depending on the moisture level to achieve optimal drying results., 
StainSoak option eliminates pre-treat: Unlike other washers, this setting starts by premixing water, detergent, and stain remover to create a powerful, yet gentle cleaning solution. Then, the temperature, tumbling actions, and time are optimized based on the stain you select., 
d: Remove 95% of allergens from your clothing, towels and bedding with our NSF-certified Allergen option, 
World's first Adaptive Dispenser designed to accept PODS®: Get the ultimate clean no matter what type of detergent you prefer with the Adaptive Dispenser., 
Perfect Steam removes tough stains: Unlike many washers, Electrolux's Perfect Steam rises from the bottom, gently lifting dirt and stains from fibers., 
Solid Soil level cleans caked on stains: The Solid Soil level gives you a deeper clean to get rid of the those tough stains that get caked on, like mud or dirt., 
Normal cycle designed for energy efficiency: Electrolux's normal cycle was specifically created to use the least energy possible to get a full load dry, so normal use puts less burden on the planet. There’s also a Dry Boost option, if you need it, 
ENERGY STAR Certified: Electrolux washer and dryer meet strict criteria to guarantee high-quality energy efficient performance--without sacrificing clean/dry., 
Reversible doors: Enjoy easy loading and unloading no matter where you place your Laundry Tower, even if it's next to a wall or in a corner,
Product Name: Laundry Tower Single Unit Front Load 4.5 Cu. Ft. Washer & 8 Cu. Ft. Electric Dryer

Description:
The Samsung Bespoke AI Laundry Hub 4.6 cu. Ft. Large Capacity Front Load washer and dryer with an Easy Reach Control Panel, offers a space-saving solution in one single machine. Complete with AI powered features that make laundry day easier. 
Laundry Hub with Easy Reach Control Panel: Laundry Hub is a full-size laundry center with a washer and dryer in one space-saving unit. Control both the washer and dryer from the Easy Reach control panel in the middle of the unit., 
AI OptiWash & AI Optimal Dry: AI OptiWash & AI Optimal Dry detects soil level and fabrics, and adjusts settings as needed during the cycle.¹, 
Flex Auto Dispense System: The Flex Auto Dispense System gives you the flexibility of automatically dispensing up to 34 loads of detergent or flex one compartment to dispense up to 20 loads of softener and 20 loads of detergent., 
Super Speed Wash & Dry: Wash and dry a full load in just 58 minutes² without sacrificing cleaning performance, and achieve a complete wash and dry in under an hour., 
4.6 cu. ft. Large Capacity: Washing and drying more items in one load, with a large capacity washer means fewer loads and less time in the laundry room., 
Wi-Fi Connectivity with SmartThings: The SmartThings App sends you end of cycle notifications and lets you remotely start, stop, or delay your Bespoke washer from your phone., 
Steam Wash: The power of steam gently removes stains without time-consuming pretreatments. Steam is released from the drum so every item in the load is thoroughly saturated, ensuring a deep clean., 
20-Year Motor Warranty: Purchase Samsung washers with confidence, and recieve a 20-Year Warranty on the Digital Inverter Motor.⁴, 
AI Smart Dial: Samsung’s AI Smart Dial simplifies your control panel, learns and recommends your favorite cycles,⁵ and allows you to customize a cycle list to your preferences., 
AI Energy Mode: Monitor and reduce your washer’s energy use. AI Energy mode lets you easily check power consumption and estimates your electricity bill. For cycles that operate in AI Energy mode it can help reduce energy use of up to 35%.⁶, 
ENERGY STAR Certified: ENERGY STAR Certified⁹, so you use less energy without sacrificing performance or functionality., 
Self Clean+: Self Clean+ cleans the inside of your washer and reminds you every 40 wash cycles when it is time for a cleaning., 
Vent Sensor: The Vent Sensor continuously monitors the condition of your dryer's air duct to make sure it’s running safely and efficiently, 
Make sure to measure: Please measure your space and ensure that this appliance is a perfect fit!,

Name: Whirlpool - 3.1 Cu. Ft. Front Load Washer and 6.7 Cu. Ft. Electric Dryer with Space Saving Configuration - White
Description:
Maximize floor productivity with the stack washer/dryer that's built to give laundry facilities the durability and performance needed to withstand the heavy traffic of commercial laundry - all within the space of a single unit. Built from heavy, galvanized steel and a porcelain enamel top, the cabinet has been designed to increase machine longevity and handle regular use. The powerful drive system was engineered and tested to provide more turns over the life of the washer and provide customers with an exceptional cleaning experience. A six-point suspension with four dampers and two springs delivers automatic load balancing, keeping cycle times consistent to help optimize laundry efficiency. Owners can take advantage of the microprocessor controls with customizable vend prices and cycle options, giving them more opportunities to generate revenue. This also lets customers choose which cycle selection best fits their washing needs. Plus, the advanced dryer venting system delivers an optimal drying performance, helping laundry facilities cut utility costs and run with efficiency. The Whirlpool Commercial Laundry stack washer/dryer is coin drop-ready, ENERGY STAR certified, and backed by a 90-day labor/2-year limited parts only warranty. 
Space-saving configuration: This washer/dryer combination maximizes facility productivity, saves space, and delivers the exceptional cleaning performance end users expect., 
Factory-installed coin drop and coin box: A robust coin drop and coin box come installed from the factory - the coin drop allows flexibility in pricing your machines for your market., 
Commercial-grade cabinet: Built with galvanized steel, the heavy-duty construction of the stack washer/dryer is designed to increase machine longevity and handle high volumes of laundry., 
Powerful drive system: Designed and tested to provide more turns over the life of the washer, this machine helps owners optimize their facility's productivity and delivers the performance customers expect., 
: A watertight, flexible triple-lip seal with a garter spring helps keep moisture away from the shaft, protecting the premium bearings, while the proven, durable shaft sleeve is designed to reduce shaft wear., 
: These components, along with a die-cast trunnion, help provide consistent washing results, increasing a facility's efficiency., 
Automatic load balancing system: Consists of a six-point suspension, four dampers, and two springs. By sensing and automatically balancing a load, the machines are able to work effectively and end on time, creating optimized cleaning cycles and constant turns., 
Microprocessor controls: Offer owners the ability to customize vend prices and washer cycle options, such as Super Cycle, ensuring optimal revenue opportunities. The controls also give customers the option to select the ideal cycle for individual wash needs., 
Advanced dryer venting system: A high-speed blower wheel optimizes performance in long vents, while high airflow reduces drying times for a wide variety of loads, increasing efficiency, and turns over the life of the machine., 
High-speed extraction: Extraction speeds up to 1000 rpm help pull water from the load, cutting drying time and increasing turns in both machines over their lives., 
Super Cycle: Offers an extra three minutes of wash time or an additional rinse for an additional cost to the user, boosting revenue opportunities., 
Time-of-day pricing: The controls offer the flexibility to program different vend pricing based on the day of the week and time of day. This allows owners to take full advantage of revenue-generating opportunities for their operation., 
High-efficiency wash system: The high-efficiency technology delivers energy savings without sacrificing cleaning performance. Water is lifted from the tub base through baffle holes, then showered through the load during the agitation pattern., 
Shaft sleeve: Helps eliminate drive shaft wear. The robust axial compression tube locks the two inner races of the premium NSK bearings, ensuring they turn with the shaft, helping to prevent drive shaft wear., 
Premium bearings: Oversize premium NSK bearings are sealed for added protection, enhancing longevity of drive system., 
Shock-resistant, cast-metal trunnion: Provides additional strength to the overall drive system and basket structure., 
Six-point suspension: Ensures better stability for the entire wash unit as a result of four dampers and two springs., 
Porcelain enamel top: The porcelain enamel top is robust, enhancing machine durability and aesthetics in high-use laundry environments., 
Accelerometer: If an unbalanced load is detected, it enables the machine to power through final spin by expanding the machine's limits and allowing redistribution of the load to occur., 
Progressive spin logic: Delivers consistent cycle times by reallocating weight to complete spinout of unbalanced loads., 
Pump routine: Reduces unbalanced loads through improved pump performance., 
Strategically designed bellow: Helps keep small items from getting caught or snagged, ensuring all items get an equal clean., 
Robust hinge: This heavy-duty, die-cast door hinge is built to withstand the rigors of commercial laundry while maintaining its integrity and aesthetics., 
: Electric cord and vent kit are sold separately and are not included.,
Product Name: 3.1 Cu. Ft. Front Load Washer and 6.7 Cu. Ft. Electric Dryer with Space Saving Configuration

Name: GE - 3.8 Cu. Ft. Top Load Washer and 5.9 Cu. Ft. Electric Dryer Laundry Center - Diamond Gray
Description:
Complete laundry efficiently in this GE Spacemaker washer and dryer. The washer has 11 wash cycles for cleaning delicates to heavy bedding, and it has a stainless steel basket for long-wearing use. This GE Spacemaker washer and dryer has a 5.9 cu. ft. electric dryer with four cycles so you can choose accurate drying times. 
Rotary-electromechanical controls (dryer): Allow fast and easy cycle selection., 
11 wash cycles: Designed to specifically handle various fabrics and soils., 
6 wash/rinse temperatures: Select the right temperature for ideal wash results., 
1 wash/spin speed combination: Speeds are matched to fabric type for great clothes care., 
Auto-load sensing with 4 water levels: The washer will automatically measure the load size and add just the right amount of water, or you can also choose your own., 
Rotary-electronic controls (washer): Simplify cycle selection., 
3.8 cu. ft. washer and 5.9 cu. ft. dryer: Accommodate large loads, saving you time and energy., 
Bleach and fabric softener dispensers: Automatically add wash aids at the appropriate time during a cycle to free you to do other things., 
Four dryer cycles: Deliver custom-care performance for a variety of fabrics., 
Lid lock: Prevents anyone (especially children) from reaching into the washer while the basket is spinning., 
All-in-one design: Offers the convenience of both a washer and dryer in a compact design to take up minimal floor space., 
: The electric cord and vent kit are sold separately and are not included.,

Description:
Miele TXD160 WP 24" T1 Electric Dryer Heat Pump DirectSelect Solid Door White WiFi (Lotus White) 
: Our EcoDry technology allows you to quickly dry a full load of laundry with minimal energy consumption, 
: Whether it's a pair of jeans, a blouse of just a sock: thanks to the AddLoad function, you can easily add any laundry items that you've forgotten up until shortly before the end of the program.,

Name: LG - STUDIO 5.0 Cu. Ft. HE Smart Front Load Washer and 7.4 Cu. Ft. Electric Dryer WashTower with Steam and TurboWash 360 - Noble Steel
Description:
LG STUDIO's vertical laundry solution puts easy access, built-in intelligence and advanced cleaning within reach. Full-size capacity and features in half the space, with a centralized control panel for the easiest access ever. And our sleekest Center Control yet– LCD panel shows descriptions of each setting, helpful prompts, status updates and remaining time. 
Mega and Ultra Large Capacity Washer and Dryer (WashTower): With 5.0 cu. ft. in the washer and 7.4 cu. ft. in the dryer, you can fit from big loads of towels or jeans to a king-size comforter and more in a single load, for big time savings every week., 
Single Unit WashTower Design: Redefine your space and reinvent how you do laundry with room to add a sink, a folding table or just organized storage—all with a sleek, streamlined look., 
: Only LG STUDIO WashTower has a convenient Center Control panel that’s perfectly positioned with both washer and dryer controls at just the right height. Typical stacked washers and dryers place dryer controls at the very top, making them hard to see and reach without using a step stool every time., 
ThinQ Technology with ThinQ Care: The LG ThinQ app helps you manage your LG Smart appliance and more, all to make your everyday a little easier. Automatically reorder supplies based on actual usage. Start or stop programs on your way home from work¹., 
: Even get proactive alerts with ThinQ Care to keep your appliance running smoothly—and your home running smarter. Compatible with Alexa and the Google Assistant and available for iOS and Android platforms, this free app will help you run your home like a pro., 
LCD Center Control Panel: Intuitive Center Control LCD panel gives you more with every touch, from descriptions of each setting and helpful prompts to status updates and remaining cycle time. Hidden from view until you tap the power button, you’ll have easy access to all washer and dryer settings., 
Built-In Intelligence (AI Fabric, Weight & Soil Level Sensors / Smart Learner / Smart Pairing): Built-in intelligence takes out the guesswork—AI technology selects optimal wash and dry motions and settings. Washer can auto-select a compatible drying cycle., 
Advanced Washing and Drying: From ultra-large capacity to top-of-the-line innovations, the LG STUDIO WashTower delivers advanced cleaning performance. TurboWash360° powers through larger loads in less time, from five jets with variable sprays that deliver a complete clean in under 30 minutes²., 
: The Allergiene wash cycle goes beyond everyday cleaning, using the power of steam to remove common household allergens in fabrics. Do more than dry—TurboSteam technology in the dryer refreshes clothes, children’s toys, decorative pillows and more in between washes., 
ezDispense Automatic Dispenser: Automatically dispenses the right amount of detergent and fabric softener, skipping refills for up to 18 loads³. Even get alerts on your smartphone when it’s time to refill, making laundry quick, easy and foolproof⁴., 
Tempered Glass Doors: LG front load washers and dryers are the first to use tempered glass doors for a sleek, stylish look that resists shock and scratches. Chrome rim complements the doors and enhance the premium feel., 
Direct Drive Motor 10-Year Limited Warranty (Washer): Backed by a 10-year limited warranty, the LG Direct Drive Motor delivers peace of mind with every load. Fewer moving parts means less noise and vibration, greater stability and durable performance you can depend on for years to come., 
ENERGY STAR Certified: High efficiency washers use less water and energy than conventionals for savings that add up. Get additional savings with load-sensing technology that adjusts water levels and wash times or add the ColdWash option., 
FlowSense Duct Clogging and Lint Filter Indicators (Dryer): With the FlowSense Duct Clogging and Clean Filter Indicators, you'll know when it's time to clean the ducts and the lint filter out to ensure great drying every time, lower utility bills and fewer service calls., 
NeveRust Stainless Steel Tubs: Unlike tubs made from porcelain or plastic, the LG NeveRust Stainless Steel Tubs avoid the chips and nicks that snag fabrics and ruin clothing. Durable surface actually gets smoother over time and keeps your washer and dryer looking like new, even after years of use., 
Tub Clean System (Washer): Thoroughly cleans and dries the tub, door and gaskets with the press of a button., 
LoDecibel Quiet Operation: Run the washer or dryer whenever you want, without interrupting naptime or your favorite show. The LG STUDIO WashTower is designed for quiet operation, from the motor to the cabinet to individual components., 
TrueBalance Anti-Vibration System (Washer): Noisy, out-of-balance loads can disrupt your laundry routine. Wash in peace with the TrueBalance anti-vibration system that keeps even big loads in balance to reduce washer noise and vibration. A must-have for main-floor or second-floor laundry rooms., 
Wrinkle Care Option (Dryer): When you hate wrinkles but can’t remove clothes as soon as they’re dry, just select Wrinkle Care before hitting start. The dryer will periodically tumble the load for up to 3 hours after the cycle is done or until the door is opened to help keep wrinkles at bay., 
AI DD 2.0 Built-In Intelligence: AI Fabric, Weight and Soil Level Sensors with Smart Pairing: Built-in intelligence takes out the guesswork—AI technology selects optimal wash motions and settings. Washer can auto-select a compatible drying cycle., 
: ¹Appliance must be set to remote enable. Wi-Fi and ThinQ app required., 
: ²Based on independent testing comparing models WKEX200/WKGX201 and WM3900 in normal cycle with TurboWash Option, 10 lb. load (June 2020), 
: ³Based on 8-12 lb. loads. Always use HE (High-Efficiency) detergent with this washer., 
: ⁴Appliance must be set to remote enable. Wi-fi and app required. Features subject to change. See lg.com for additional details and privacy information.,

Name: Frigidaire - 3.9 Cu. Ft Washer and 5.5 Cu. Ft. Electric Dryer Laundry Center with Long Vent - White
Description:
The Frigidaire Long Vent Laundry Center with 3.9 Cu. Ft. Washer and 5.5 Cu. Ft. Dryer provides a big-time clean in a tight space with the movement of the powerful agitator. The MaxFill option option allows for maximum water level for the selected cycle and the spacious capacity of the washer allows you to wash a king-sized comforter. 
Excellent Cleaning Performance: The movement of the agitator in the washer ensures your clothes come out clean., 
Quick Wash and Dry Cycles Save You Time: Get a load done faster with quick wash and dry cycles., 
Largest Laundry Center Washer Capacity Allows You To Wash More Clothes: Fit more in every load with 3.9 cu. ft. washer capacity., 
MaxFill Gives You The Maximum Water For The Ultimate Clean: MaxFill options allows for the maximum water level for the selected cycle., 
11 Different Wash Cycles To Fit Your Needs: Features 11 wash cycles to meet all of your washing needs such as Delicate, Activewear, Bulky and Colors., 
6 Different Dry Cycles To Fit Your Needs: Features 6 dry cycles to meet all of your drying needs such as Delicate, Activewear, Bulky, and Air Fluff., 
4 Timed Dryer Cycles: Select your desired drying time limit that works with your schedule., 
Quieter Clean with Quiet Pack: New sound-dampening technology offers quieter operation., 
Laundry Cycle Status Lights Keep You Informed: Green LED lights keep you informed on when the cycle is washing, rinsing, spinning and done., 
Convenient End-of-Cycle Signal: Always know when your laundry is done with the end-of-cycle beep., 
Long Vent Design: Accommodates more spaces with long 127 ft vent design.,

Name: Samsung - OPEN BOX 5.3 Cu. Ft. Washer with AI OptiWash and 7.6 Cu. Ft. Electric Dryer - Satin Green
Description:
The Samsung Bespoke AI Laundry Hub 5.3 cu ft. Ultra Capacity Front Load washer and dryer includes an Easy Reach Control Panel and offers a space-saving solution in one single machine. Complete with AI powered features that make laundry day easier. 
Laundry Hub with Easy Reach Control Panel: Laundry Hub is a full-size laundry center with a washer and dryer in one space-saving unit. Control both the washer and dryer from the Easy Reach Control Panel in the middle of the unit., 
Ultra Capacity 5.3 cu. ft.: Washing and drying more items in one load, with an ultra capacity washer means fewer loads and less time in the laundry room., 
AI OptiWash & AI Optimal Dry: AI OptiWash and AI Optimal Dry automatically detect both fabrics and soil levels, and adjust laundry settings as needed during the cycle.¹, 
Flex Auto Dispense System: The Flex Auto Dispense System gives you the flexibility of automatically dispensing up to 34 loads of detergent or flex one compartment to dispense up to 20 loads of softener and 20 loads of detergent., 
Super Speed Wash & Dry: Wash and dry a full load in just 58 minutes² without sacrificing cleaning performance, and achieve a complete wash and dry in under an hour., 
Wi-Fi Connectivity with SmartThings: The SmartThings App sends you end of cycle notifications and lets you remotely start, stop, or delay your Bespoke washer from your phone.³, 
Steam Wash: The power of steam gently removes stains without time-consuming pretreatments. Steam is released from the drum so every item in the load is thoroughly saturated, ensuring a deep clean., 
20-Year Motor Warranty: Purchase Samsung washers with confidence, and recieve a 20-Year Warranty on the Digital Inverter Motor.⁴, 
AI Smart Dial: Samsung’s AI Smart Dial simplifies your control panel, learns and recommends your favorite cycles,⁵ and allows you to customize a cycle list to your preferences., 
AI Energy Mode: Monitor and reduce your washer’s energy use. AI Energy mode lets you easily check power consumption and estimates your electricity bill. For cycles that operate in AI Energy mode it can help reduce energy use of up to 35%.⁶, 
ENERGY STAR Certified: ENERGY STAR Certified⁸, so you use less energy without sacrificing performance or functionality., 
Self Clean+: Self Clean+ cleans the inside of your washer and reminds you every 40 wash cycles when it is time for a cleaning., 
Steam Sanitize+: Our Steam Sanitize+ cycle removes 95% of pollen⁹ from fabric, while Multi-Steam refreshes clothing and relaxes light wrinkles, 
: Electric cord and vent kit are sold separately and are not included., 
: ¹Fabric sensing operates for 8 lbs and under. Based on AI algorithm using IEC 8 lbs load. To prevent wear, wash like fabrics together. Results may vary. A turbidity sensor operates for all weights, while fabric sensing operates for 8 lbs and under., 
: ²Based on 8lb D.O.E. standard load (50% cotton, 50% poly)., 
: ³Available on Android and iOS devices. A Wi-Fi connection and a Samsung account are required., 
: Gas: ³Available on Android and iOS devices. A Wi-Fi connection and a Samsung account are required. Only monitoring enabled on Gas dryers for safety reasons.,

: ⁶Available on Android and iOS devices. A Wi-Fi connection and a Samsung account are required., 
: Can be applied on AI OptiWash, Super Speed, Small Load, Towels, Heavy Duty, Power Rinse cycle only when the selected washing temperature is 'hot'. Based on internal testing on the WF8900B model with IEC 8lb load except for Small Load,

: ⁸Visit www.energystar.gov for more information on ENERGY STAR guidelines., 
: ⁹Testing based on Samsung internal protocols. Results provided to and interpreted by Intertek. Individual results may vary.,

Name: Samsung - OPEN BOX Bespoke AI 5.3 Cu. Ft. All-in-One Washer & Electric Dryer Combo Super Speed Wash and Ventless Heat Pump Dryer - Dark Steel
Description:
The Bespoke AI Laundry Combo machine is the industry’s fastest and largest All-in-One Combo washer & dryer. It washes and dries clothes in one machine in 98 minutes with the Super Speed cycle. 
AI Laundry Combo: AI Laundry Combo washes and dries clothes in one machine with no load transfer. Easy installation with a 120V standard outlet. No dryer vent exhaust system needed., 
Ultra Capacity with Super Speed: This 5.3 cu. ft Ultra Capacity Combo washer and dryer delivers powerful cleaning performance in 98 minutes.¹, 
AI Opti Wash & Dry: AI Opti Wash & Dry detects soil level and fabrics adjusting settings as needed during the cycle to deliver a better wash & dry.², 
Flex Auto Dispense System: Automatically dispense up to 47 loads of detergent or flex one compartment to dispense up to 34 loads of softener and 25 loads of detergent with the Flex Auto Dispense System., 
Easy Installation: The Bespoke AI Laundry Combo All-in-One washer and ventless heat pump dryer plugs into any standard 120V outlet, 
7" AI Home LCD Display: The intuitive 7" AI Home LCD Display gives you quick and easy access to cycles & washer and dryer settings., 
Auto Open Door: The Auto Open Door opens at the end of the drying cycle to evaporate any leftover moisture leaving clothes perfectly dry and smelling fresh for when you're ready to take them out., 
Wi-Fi Connectivity with SmartThings: The SmartThings App sends you end of cycle notifications and lets you remotely start, stop, or delay your AI Laundry Combo Washer/Dryer from your phone.³, 
Steam Wash: The power of steam gently removes stains without time-consuming pretreatments. Steam is released from the drum so every item in the load is thoroughly saturated, ensuring a deep clean., 
Voice Control: Easily select your Bespoke AI Laundry Combo(tm) washer and dryer cycle, turn it on or off, access settings and more — all with your voice.³, 
Auto Cleaning System: The Auto Cleaning System cleans lint from the condenser, ensuring maintenance-free usage.⁵, 
20-Year Motor Warranty: Purchase Samsung washers with confidence, and recieve a 20-Year Warranty on the Digital Inverter Motor.⁴, 
ENERGY STAR Most Efficient: Our washers are recognized by the EPA in delivering cutting edge energy efficiency along with the latest in technological innovation, 
AI Bubble: Samsung AI Bubble combines water, air and detergent to create a cleansing foam that seeps into fabrics for an effective wash., 
Less Microfiber Cycle: Reduce the chances of micro plastics from escaping into the world’s oceans. The Less Microfiber cycle gently cleans synthetic textiles reducing 39% of microfibers releasing into the ocean., 
Self Clean+ & Self Dry: Self Clean+ cleans the inside of your AI Laundry Combo washer and will remind you every 40 wash cycles when it is time for a cleaning. Self Dry cycle removes excess moisture from the drum and helps keep your machine smelling fresh., 
AI Energy Mode: Monitor and reduce your washer’s energy use. AI Energy mode lets you easily check power consumption and estimates your electricity bill. For cycles that operate in AI Energy mode it can help reduce energy use of up to 19%.⁶, 
Measurement: Please measure your space and ensure that this appliance is the perfect fit., 
: ¹Based on using a Super Speed cycle only with an 10 lb DOE load (cotton 50% + polyester 50%). Individual results may vary based on actual load content.,

Name: Asko 4.1 cu. ft. Stackable Electric Condensation Dryer, Butterfly Drying System, Soft Drum Technology, 9 Programs-White
Description:
24 Inch Electric Dryer with 4.1 Cu. Ft. Capacity, Butterfly Drying System, Soft Drum Technology, Line Concept, Multi Filter System, LCD Display, Stack Kit Included, 9 Dry Cycles, Sensi Dry, Airing, Anti-Crease, and Auto Synthetic 
Soft Drum: Soft Drum is a solution developed to enhance air flow around the load, thereby increasing the drying effect. The circular indentations with bevelled edges also have a cushioning effect that reduces wear and tear on fabrics. The new drum design allows for even and gentle drying with both small and large loads., 
Butterfly Drying: This smart feature is our own invention. It saves both the motor and your ironing board. The unique paddles inside the drum tumble the clothes in a figure eight to prevent the clothes from bundling. This leads to a reduced need to reverse the drum rotation. This is an intelligent function which saves the motor and the belt from any unnecessary strain and your clothes from creasing., 
Multi Filter System: The Multi Filter System effectively traps all lint before reaching more sensitive parts of the tumble dryer. This keeps the drying times shorter and the machine up and running., 
Sensi dry: The ASKO Sensi Dry system measures moisture in and around the machine, which prevents unnecessary over-drying as well as wear and tear on your clothes., 
Stainless Steel Drum: At ASKO, we believe not only that stainless steel will outlast for example, plastic, but also that quality materials will always look better in years to come. Eventually, galvanised steel rusts, so we decided to make our drums out of stainless steel. That’s why our tumble dryers really do last longer.,
Product Name: Asko 4.1 cu. ft. Stackable Electric Condensation Dryer, Butterfly Drying System, Soft Drum Technology, 9 Programs-White

Name: LG - 5.0 Cu. Ft. HE Smart Front Load Washer and 7.4 Cu. Ft. Gas Dryer WashTower with Steam and Center Control - Black Steel
Description:
Full-size and fully featured, with the washer on the bottom and dryer on top, the sleek single unit LG WashTower takes up half the space¹, giving you room to add a sink, a folding table or whatever you like. But unlike conventional stacked pairs, LG’s exclusive Center Control panel is perfectly positioned with both washer and dryer controls at just the right height. The intuitive Center Control LCD panel gives you more of what you need with every touch, from descriptions of each setting and helpful prompts to status updates and remaining cycle time. Built-in intelligence makes laundry less of a chore by taking out the guesswork, while top-of-the-line innovations put advanced cleaning power within reach. 
Mega and Ultra Large Capacity 5.0 cu.ft. Washer and 7.4 cu.ft. Dryer (WashTower): Get it all done in less time. Mega and Ultra Large Capacity (5.0 cu. ft. in the washer and 7.4 cu. ft. in the dryer) means you have even more room to do laundry in fewer loads., 
Single Unit WashTower Design: This vertical laundry solution puts everything within reach. Full-size capacity and features in half the space¹, with a centralized control panel for the easiest access ever., 
LCD Center Control Panel: Intuitive Center Control LCD panel gives you more of what you need with every touch, from descriptions of each setting and helpful prompts to status updates and remaining cycle time., 
: Hidden from view until you tap the power button, when you’ll have easy access to all washer and dryer settings., 
ThinQ Care: Keep your appliances running smoothly with ThinQ Care, now in the ThinQ app. Get notifications about usage, maintenance, plus early diagnosis right on your phone. ThinQ Care will help you understand your appliance needs, avoid potential problems, and keep your appliance running its best., 
Built-In Intelligence: Forget about endless sorting or toggling through cycles—built-in sensors use AI technology to detect fabric texture, soil level, and load size, then automatically select the right wash/dry motions, temperatures and more for advanced fabric care., 
: Activate Smart Learner² in the ThinQ app, and WashTower will remember your preferred settings, from wash temp to spin speed to dry level—so you don’t have to. With Smart Pairing, the washer can even tell the dryer to select a compatible drying cycle³, making it the ultimate laundry hack., 
Advanced Washing and Drying: From mega capacity to top-of-the-line innovations, the LG WashTower delivers the advanced cleaning performance you need., 
ezDispense Automatic Dispenser: Automatically dispenses the right amount of detergent and fabric softener, skipping refills for up to 18 loads⁴. Even get alerts on your smartphone when it’s time to refill, making laundry quick, easy and foolproof.⁵, 
Tempered Glass Doors: LG front load washers and dryers are the first to use tempered glass doors for a sleek, stylish look that resists shock and scratches. Chrome rim complements the doors and enhance the premium feel., 
Direct Drive Motor 10-Year Limited Warranty: Backed by a 10-year limited warranty, the LG Direct Drive Motor delivers peace of mind with every load. Fewer moving parts means less noise and vibration, greater stability and durable performance you can depend on for years to come., 
FlowSense Duct Clogging and Lint Filter Indicators: FlowSense Duct Clogging and Lint Filter Indicators tell when your ducts and filter need lint cleaning, improve dryer performance for greater efficiency and lower utility bills, and help give you safer, worry-free operation with fewer service calls., 
NeveRust Stainless Steel Tub: Unlike tubs made from porcelain or plastic, the LG NeveRust Stainless Steel Tubs avoid the chips and nicks that can snag fabrics and ruin clothing. Durable surface actually gets smoother over time and keeps your washer and dryer looking like new, even years later., 
Tub Clean System: With LG Tub Clean system, you don’t have to worry about mold, mildew or musty odors. Select the Tub Clean cycle, add liquid bleach or other cleaner and let the washer work to clean and dry the tub, door and gaskets. Run it every month or so to keep your washer clean and fresh., 
TrueBalance Anti-Vibration System: Noisy, out-of-balance loads can disrupt your laundry routine. LG helps you wash in peace with the TrueBalance anti-vibration system that keeps even big loads in balance to reduce washer noise and vibration. A must-have for main- or second-floor laundry rooms., 
LoDecibel Quiet Operation: Run the washer or dryer whenever you want, without interrupting naptime or your favorite show. The LG WashTower is designed for quiet operation, from the motor to the cabinet to individual components., 
LoDecibel Quiet Operation: When you hate wrinkles but can’t be there to remove clothes as soon as they’re dry, select the Wrinkle Care before hitting start. The dryer will periodically tumble the load for up to 3 hours after the cycle is done or until the door is opened to help keep wrinkles at bay.,

Name: Whirlpool - 3.1 Cu. Ft. Front Load Washer and 6.7 Cu. Ft. Electric Dryer with Space Saving Configuration - White
Description:
Maximize floor productivity with the stack washer/dryer that's built to give laundry facilities the durability and performance needed to withstand the heavy traffic of commercial laundry - all within the space of a single unit. Built from heavy, galvanized steel and a porcelain enamel top, the cabinet has been designed to increase machine longevity and handle regular use. The powerful drive system was engineered and tested to provide more turns over the life of the washer and provide customers with an exceptional cleaning experience. A six-point suspension with four dampers and two springs delivers automatic load balancing, keeping cycle times consistent to help optimize laundry efficiency. Owners can take advantage of the microprocessor controls with customizable vend prices and cycle options, giving them more opportunities to generate revenue. This also lets customers choose which cycle selection best fits their washing needs. Plus, the advanced dryer venting system delivers an optimal drying performance, helping laundry facilities cut utility costs and run with efficiency. The Whirlpool Commercial Laundry stack washer/dryer is coin drop-ready, ENERGY STAR certified, and backed by a 90-day labor/2-year limited parts only warranty. 
Space-saving configuration: This washer/dryer combination maximizes facility productivity, saves space, and delivers the exceptional cleaning performance end users expect., 
Factory-installed coin drop and coin box: A robust coin drop and coin box come installed from the factory - the coin drop allows flexibility in pricing your machines for your market., 
Commercial-grade cabinet: Built with galvanized steel, the heavy-duty construction of the stack washer/dryer is designed to increase machine longevity and handle high volumes of laundry., 
Powerful drive system: Designed and tested to provide more turns over the life of the washer, this machine helps owners optimize their facility's productivity and delivers the performance customers expect., 
: A watertight, flexible triple-lip seal with a garter spring helps keep moisture away from the shaft, protecting the premium bearings, while the proven, durable shaft sleeve is designed to reduce shaft wear., 
: These components, along with a die-cast trunnion, help provide consistent washing results, increasing a facility's efficiency., 
Automatic load balancing system: Consists of a six-point suspension, four dampers, and two springs. By sensing and automatically balancing a load, the machines are able to work effectively and end on time, creating optimized cleaning cycles and constant turns., 
Microprocessor controls: Offer owners the ability to customize vend prices and washer cycle options, such as Super Cycle, ensuring optimal revenue opportunities. The controls also give customers the option to select the ideal cycle for individual wash needs., 
Advanced dryer venting system: A high-speed blower wheel optimizes performance in long vents, while high airflow reduces drying times for a wide variety of loads, increasing efficiency, and turns over the life of the machine., 
High-speed extraction: Extraction speeds up to 1000 rpm help pull water from the load, cutting drying time and increasing turns in both machines over their lives., 
Super Cycle: Offers an extra three minutes of wash time or an additional rinse for an additional cost to the user, boosting revenue opportunities., 
Time-of-day pricing: The controls offer the flexibility to program different vend pricing based on the day of the week and time of day. This allows owners to take full advantage of revenue-generating opportunities for their operation., 
High-efficiency wash system: The high-efficiency technology delivers energy savings without sacrificing cleaning performance. Water is lifted from the tub base through baffle holes, then showered through the load during the agitation pattern., 
Shaft sleeve: Helps eliminate drive shaft wear. The robust axial compression tube locks the two inner races of the premium NSK bearings, ensuring they turn with the shaft, helping to prevent drive shaft wear., 
Premium bearings: Oversize premium NSK bearings are sealed for added protection, enhancing longevity of drive system., 
Shock-resistant, cast-metal trunnion: Provides additional strength to the overall drive system and basket structure., 
Six-point suspension: Ensures better stability for the entire wash unit as a result of four dampers and two springs., 
Porcelain enamel top: The porcelain enamel top is robust, enhancing machine durability and aesthetics in high-use laundry environments., 
Accelerometer: If an unbalanced load is detected, it enables the machine to power through final spin by expanding the machine's limits and allowing redistribution of the load to occur., 
Progressive spin logic: Delivers consistent cycle times by reallocating weight to complete spinout of unbalanced loads., 
Pump routine: Reduces unbalanced loads through improved pump performance., 
Strategically designed bellow: Helps keep small items from getting caught or snagged, ensuring all items get an equal clean., 
Robust hinge: This heavy-duty, die-cast door hinge is built to withstand the rigors of commercial laundry while maintaining its integrity and aesthetics., 
: Electric cord and vent kit are sold separately and are not included.,
Product Name: 3.1 Cu. Ft. Front Load Washer and 6.7 Cu. Ft. Electric Dryer with Space Saving Configuration

Name: LG - 4.5 Cu. Ft. High-Efficiency Smart Front-Load Washer and Electric Dryer Combo with Steam and TurboWash Technology - Black Steel
Description:
Enjoy the convenience of an all-in-one washer/dryer without giving up on capacity. Give big loads the same great clean while cutting your wash time by up to 30 minutes with LG's enhanced TurboWash technology. Based on the cycle you select, LG 6Motion technology uses up to 6 different wash motions, each designed to get clothes cleaner and help them last longer. Breathe a little easier with the Allergiene cycle that uses the gentle power of steam to remove common household allergens from bedding, baby clothes and more. And with LG ThinQ technology, you can get alerts on your smartphone the minute clothes are clean and control key washer and dryer features from anywhere, at any time. 
4.5 cu. ft. ultra large capacity: Towers of towels, piles of sweatshirts, and a mountain of jeans? Go for it. The ultra large capacity (4.5 cu. ft.) tub lets you do more laundry in fewer loads. That's time saved and sore backs avoided., 
TurboWash technology: Give big loads the same great clean while cutting your wash time by up to 30 minutes with LG's enhanced TurboWash technology., 
6Motion technology: Based on the cycle you select, LG 6Motion technology uses up to 6 different wash motions, each designed to get clothes cleaner and help them last longer., 
ThinQ Care: Keep your appliances running smoothly with ThinQ Care, now in the ThinQ app. Get notifications about usage, maintenance, plus early diagnosis right on your phone. ThinQ Care will help you understand your appliance needs, avoid potential problems, and keep your appliance running its best., 
Steam technology: There's no clean like a steam clean. LG's steam technology gently but powerfully penetrates fabrics to virtually eliminate dirt, odors, and wrinkles., 
Allergiene cycle, AAFA certified: Certified asthma & allergy friendly by the Asthma and Allergy Foundation of America (AAFA)., 
: Breathe a little easier with the Allergiene cycle that uses the gentle power of steam to remove common household allergens from bedding, baby clothes and more. A proven solution for creating a healthier home - perfect for more than 65 million Americans living with asthma and allergies., 
Ventless condensing drying: No access to external venting? No problem. LG's all-in-one washer/dryers use ventless condensing to dry your clothes without the need for external venting., 
ColdWash technology: Provides cold water savings with warm water performance., 
Direct-drive motor 10-year limited warranty: Backed by a 10-year limited warranty, the LG direct-drive motor delivers peace of mind with every load. Fewer moving parts mean less noise and vibration, greater stability, and durable performance you can depend on for years to come., 
LG SideKick compatible: This LG washer is LG SideKick compatible, which means you can add the mini pedestal washer to your front-load washer and tackle two loads at the same time., 
NeveRust stainless steel tub: Unlike tubs made from porcelain or plastic, the full stainless steel tub avoids the chips and nicks that can snag fabrics and ruin expensive clothing., 
LoDecibel quiet operation: Run the washer whenever you want - the motor and other components are designed for quiet operation that won't interrupt naptime or your favorite show., 
TrueBalance anti-vibration system: You shouldn't know your washer is on from the next room. The LG TrueBalance anti-vibration system is designed to reduce washer noise and vibration for smooth, quiet performance in any room of the house, even if it's on another floor., 
TubClean cycle: The TubClean cycle is designed for easy periodic maintenance to keep your washer fresh. The cycle uses water jets to clean the wash tub and door, and an air dryer removes excess moisture, helping keep your high-performing washer in perfect condition., 
TubFresh system: LG's TubFresh system helps make it easy to keep your washer clean and fresh., 
SmartDiagnosis: Troubleshoot quickly and efficiently with SmartDiagnosis.¹, 
SenseClean system: It's a big washer, but that doesn't mean you have to do a big load every time. LG's SenseClean system automatically sets the water level and wash time for each load based on the weight., 
: Dryer cords are not shipped with the dryer. It is the responsibility of the consumer to purchase the appropriate cord for their home., 
: ¹SmartDiagnosis is designed to supplement existing methods of problem identification and may not be able to troubleshoot all issues.,

Name: Samsung - 7.4 Cu. Ft. Smart Gas Dryer with Steam and Sensor Dry - Ivory
Description:
Samsung's Large Capacity Gas Dryer is equipped with Steam Sanitize+, which removes 95% of pollen from fabric, while Multi-Steam refreshes clothing and relaxes light wrinkles. With Wi-Fi connectivity, you can remotely monitor your dryer from our simple-to-use SmartThings App. Sensor Dry automatically optimizes the time and temperature of the drying cycle to help prevent overdrying while avoiding excess energy use. 
Steam Sanitize+: Our Steam Sanitize+ cycle removes 95% of pollen¹ from fabric, while Multi-Steam refreshes clothing and relaxes light wrinkles., 
Wi-Fi Connectivity with SmartThings: The SmartThings App sends you end-of-cycle notifications and lets you remotely start, stop, or monitor your dryer from your phone.², 
ENERGY STAR® Certified: ENERGY STAR® Certified,³ so you can save money by using less energy without sacrificing performance or functionality., 
Sensor Dry: Automatically optimizes the time and temperature of your drying cycle to protect your clothes from heat damage, while avoiding excess energy use.,

Name: LG - STUDIO 5.0 Cu. Ft. HE Smart Front Load Washer and 7.4 Cu. Ft. Gas Dryer WashTower with Steam and Built-In Intelligence - Noble Steel
Description:
Make a statement without missing a beat with a sleek, single laundry unit that takes up half the space. Thinking of laundry in your main suite or closet? Done. All so you can take the best care of your family's favorite fabrics. The LG STUDIO WashTower is full-sized and fully featured with the washer on the bottom and dryer on top. Built-in intelligence takes the guesswork out by using the latest cleaning innovations. Unlike conventional stacked pairs, the exclusive Center Control panel has both controls at just the right height. 
Ultra Large Capacity 5.0 cu.ft. Washer and 7.4 cu.ft. Dryer (WashTower): Say never again to never-ending piles of laundry—ultra-large capacity fits more clothes in every load and helps you power through laundry day in less time., 
: With 5.0 cu. ft. in the washer and 7.4 cu. ft. in the dryer, you can fit from big loads of towels or jeans to a king-size comforter and more in a single load, for big time savings every week., 
ThinQ Care: Keep your appliances running smoothly with ThinQ Care, now in the ThinQ app. Get notifications about usage, maintenance, plus early diagnosis right on your phone. ThinQ Care will help you understand your appliance needs, avoid potential problems, and keep your appliance running its best., 
Single unit WashTower design: Redefine your space and reinvent how you do laundry with room to add a sink, a folding table or just organized storage—all with a sleek, streamlined look. Only LG STUDIO WashTower has the convenient Center Control panel that’s perfectly positioned with both washer and, 
: dryer controls at just the right height. Typical stacked washers and dryers place dryer controls at the very top, making them hard to see and reach without using a step stool every time., 
Built-in Intelligence: Forget about endless sorting or toggling through cycles—built-in sensors use AI technology to detect fabric texture and load size, then automatically select the right wash/dry motions, temperatures and more for advanced fabric care., 
: Activate Smart Learner in the ThinQ app, and WashTower will remember your preferred settings, from wash temp to spin speed to dry level—so you don’t have to. With Smart Pairing, the washer can even tell the dryer to select a compatible drying cycle, making it the ultimate laundry hack., 
Advanced Washing and Drying: From ultra-large capacity to top-of-the-line innovations, the LG STUDIO WashTower delivers the advanced cleaning performance you need. TurboWash360° powers through larger loads in less time, thanks to five jets with variable sprays that deliver complete clean in under, 
: 30 minutes. The Allergiene wash cycle goes beyond everyday cleaning, using the power of steam to remove common household allergens in fabrics by more than 95%¹. Do more than dry—TurboSteam technology in the dryer refreshes clothes, toys, decorative pillows and more in between washes., 
ThinQ Technology: Use the ThinQ app to start the laundry while you’re out shopping, check remaining cycle time or get notifications on your smartphone. Go hands-free—select features work with Alexa and the Google Assistant., 
: Never run out of supplies again—Amazon Dash Replenishment Service tracks usage and automatically delivers your favorite supplies right to your door. ThinQ Care offers preventative maintenance tips, alerts, and expedited repairs, for enhanced satisfaction plus improved performance., 
AAFA certified LG washer: Certified asthma and allergy friendly by the Asthma and Allergy Foundation of America (AAFA)²—LG washers are the first to earn this distinction. Breathe easier with the Allergiene cycle that uses the gentle power of steam to remove pet dander and dust from bedding,, 
: baby clothes and more. A proven tool for creating a healthier home—perfect for the more than 65 million Americans living with asthma and allergies., 
TubClean system: With the LG TubClean system, you don’t have to worry about mold, mildew or musty odors. Select the TubClean cycle, add liquid bleach or other cleaner and let the washer do the work to clean and dry the tub, door and gaskets every month or so to keep your washer clean and fresh., 
FlowSense Technology: FlowSense Duct Clogging and Lint Filter Indicators let you know when your ducts and filter need cleaning to avoid lint buildup, improve the dryer’s performance for greater efficiency and lower utility bills, and help give you safer, worry-free operation with fewer service calls., 
Wrinkle Care option: When you hate wrinkles but can’t be there to remove clothes as soon as they’re dry, just select Wrinkle Care before hitting start. The dryer will periodically tumble the load for up to 3 hours after the cycle is done or until the door is opened to help keep wrinkles at bay., 
Tempered glass doors: LG front load washers and dryers use tempered glass doors for a sleek, stylish look that resists shock and scratches. Chrome rims and matching control knobs complement the doors and enhance the premium feel., 
NeveRust Stainless Steel Tubs: Unlike tubs made from porcelain or plastic, LG NeveRust Stainless Steel Tubs avoid the chips and nicks that can snag fabrics and ruin clothing. Durable surface actually gets smoother over time and keeps your washer and dryer looking like new, even after years of use., 
TrueBalance anti-vibration system: Noisy, out-of-balance loads can disrupt your laundry routine—and your day. LG helps you wash in peace with the TrueBalance anti-vibration system that keeps even big loads in balance to reduce washer noise and vibration., 
LoDecibel Quiet Operation: Run the washer or dryer whenever you want, without interrupting naptime or your favorite show. The LG STUDIO WashTower is designed for quiet operation, from the motor to the cabinet to individual components., 
ENERGY STAR Certified: High efficiency washer uses far less water and energy than a conventional washer for savings that add up with each load. Get additional savings with load-sensing technology that adjusts water levels and wash times or by adding the ColdWash option to almost any cycle., 
: For drying, efficient sensor drying and low-heat settings save energy and money without sacrificing performance., 
Direct Drive Motor 10-year limited warranty: Backed by a 10-year limited warranty, the LG Direct Drive Motor delivers peace of mind with every load. Fewer moving parts means less noise and vibration, greater stability and durable performance you can depend on for years to come., 
: ¹Based on independent testing comparing models WKEX200/WKGX201 and WM3900 in normal cycle with TurboWash Option, 10 lb. load (June 2020), 
: ²AAFA certified LG washers with the Allergiene Cycle use the power of steam to remove over 95% of pet dander and dust.,
Product Name: STUDIO 5.0 Cu. Ft. HE Smart Front Load Washer and 7.4 Cu. Ft. Gas Dryer WashTower with Steam and Built-In Intelligence
Drying Cycles: Normal, Bedding, Delicates, Heavy Duty, Small Load, Down-loaded
Options and Programs: Wrinkle Care, Steam, Reduce Static , Energy Saver, Steam Fresh, Drum Light, Control Lock, Signal, Wi-Fi / Remote Start

Name: LG - 7.3 Cu. Ft. Electric Dryer with Sensor Dry - White
Description:
The LG Sensor Dry system keeps tabs on moisture levels throughout the cycle and automatically adjusts drying time as needed—so you don’t have to. And with generous 7.3 cu. ft. capacity that fits more laundry in every load, this dryer makes laundry day easier all-around. FlowSense duct clogging indicator lets you know when your ducts need cleaning to avoid lint buildup and keep your dryer clean, efficient and safe. 
7.4 cu. ft. Ultra Large Capacity: Free up your day—fit more clothes in every load with 7.3 cu. ft. of space. Running fewer loads saves energy and money on your utility bill., 
Sensor Dry: No more damp clothes—the built-in sensor detects moisture levels and automatically adjusts drying time for loads of all sizes. No more overdrying—dryer shuts off at just the right time to save energy with less wear and tear on clothes., 
FlowSense Duct Clogging and Lint Filter Indicators: FlowSense Duct Clogging and Lint Filter Indicators tell when ducts and filter need cleaning of lint buildup, improve dryer performance for greater efficiency and lower utility bills, and give safer, worry-free operation with fewer service calls., 
ENERGY STAR Certified: High efficiency sensor drying and low-heat settings save energy and money by using about 20% less energy¹ than conventional models without sacrificing features or performance., 
Aluminized Alloy Steel Drum: An advanced aluminized alloy coating is added to the steel dryer drum to enhance durability and maintain its luster and attractive finish. Helps keep nicks and chips at bay so your dryer looks like new even after years of use., 
LoDecibel Quiet Operation: Run the dryer whenever you want, without interrupting naptime or your favorite show. This dryer is designed for quiet operation, from the motor to the cabinet to individual components. Pleasant end-of-cycle chime lets you know when clothes are dry., 
SmartDiagnosis: If you ever experience an issue with your LG washer or dryer, you don't have to worry. The SmartDiagnosis feature helps the service center diagnose problems over the phone, or with a simple app on your smart phone, helping you minimize costly, inconvenient service calls.²,

Name: Samsung - 7.4 Cu. Ft. Smart Gas Dryer with Steam Sanitize+ - Ivory
Description:
Samsung’s new Smart Dryer has integrated Wi-Fi that allows you to remotely start or stop your cycle, schedule laundry on your time, and receive end of cycle alerts and more, right from your smartphone. Also, the Steam Sanitize+ cycle eliminates 99.9% of germs and bacteria while relaxing and smoothing away wrinkles from everyday wear. 
Ivory Finish: Samsung’s new premium ivory finish marries a timeless color with a sophisticated design, never before seen in laundry. Ivory is the latest offering in a palette of colors perfect to complement today’s design trends., 
Wi-Fi Connectivity: Wi-Fi connected so you can receive end of cycle alerts, remotely start or stop your drying, schedule cycles on your time, and more, right from your smartphone with the SmartThings App.¹, 
Steam Sanitize+: The Steam Sanitize+ cycle removes 99.9% of germs and bacteria, over 95% of pollen, and kills 100% of dust mites.² Multi-Steam Technology steams away wrinkles, odors, and static., 
ENERGY STAR Certified: ENERGY STAR Certified,³ so you can save money by using less energy without sacrificing performance or functionality., 
Sensor Dry: Automatically optimizes the time and temperature of your drying cycle to protect your clothes from heat damage, while avoiding excess energy use., 
CleanGuard: Have peace of mind with antimicrobial technology that protects high-touch areas of your dryer.⁴, 
Vent Sensor: Vent Sensor continually monitors the condition of your dryer's air duct to ensure it is operating safely and efficiently., 
: It automatically notifies you when it is time for a cleaning and prompts you to check for obstructions, so you can always maintain optimum drying performance., 
Smart Care: Easy troubleshooting from the convenience of your smartphone.⁵ Smart Care interacts with your washer and dryer to perform an immediate diagnosis and offer quick solutions., 
Interior Drum Light: Put an end to stray socks or smaller laundry items that are hard to spot. An interior drum light brightly illuminates your laundry and the rest of the interior, so you can quickly and safely check your dryer’s contents., 
Reversible Dryer Door: Choose the direction your dryer door opens to better suit your laundry room layout., 
Accessibility (AUI, Braille): Aiding the visually and hearing impaired, your washer and dryer now features audio assistance, playing a different sound for each option, and braille right next to key control panel buttons., 
Large 7.4 cu. ft. Capacity: Fewer loads, less time in the laundry room, and more time doing the things you love., 
Lint Filter Indicator: Stop worrying about lint or fluff building up and blocking your dryer’s air intake. The Lint Filter Indicator light on the control panel will provide you with a helpful reminder when it is time to clean the filter, so your dryer maintains optimal performance., 
: ¹Requires wireless network, Samsung account and SmartThings App. The Samsung SmartThings App supports Android OS 4.0 (ICS) or later which is optimized for Samsung smartphones (Galaxy S and Galaxy Note series).,

Name: Maytag - 4.7 Cu. Ft. High Efficiency Top Load Washer with Extra Power Button - Volcano Black
Description:
This 4.7 cu. ft. capacity top load washer from Maytag delivers the stain-fighting power that’s built to handle tough loads. Use Extra Power for boosted stain fighting on any wash cycle while the Power agitator uses a 360-degree wash action to break up messes and knock the stubborn out of stains. 
Extra Power: Extra Power boosts stain fighting on any wash cycle with an intense pre-wash and extra agitation so you can walk away while stains wash away., 
Deep Fill Option: Get more water when you want it with the Deep Fill Option. Choose from multiple water levels to saturate loads, loosen stains and help soak away tough messes., 
Built-In Water Faucet: The built-in water faucet rinses, spot treats or soaks clothes right in the washer—no extra steps needed. After three hours, the water drains, leaving clothes ready for the wash cycle., 
Quick Wash Cycle: Strapped for time? Using extra high-spin speeds, the Quick Wash cycle cleans small, lightly soiled loads in 30 minutes. Get clean clothes fast by pairing it with the Quick Dry cycle on matching Maytag dryers., 
Power Agitator: Trust the Power agitator to knock the stubborn out of stains. A 360-degree wash action keeps clothes moving to help break up messes.,

Name: LG - 2.4 Cu. Ft. HE Smart Front Load Washer and 4.2 Cu. Ft. Electric Dryer WashTower wSteam and Ventless Heat Pump Technology - White
Description:
Offering all the convenience and easy reach of our full-size LG WashTower, but in a compact size that’s perfect for cleaning smaller loads or fitting into smaller spaces. Equipped with a HeatPump ventless dryer, it offers flexible installation and greater energy savings—using up to 65% less energy to dry every load¹. What didn’t change? The single unit design still takes up half the space². Washer and dryer controls are still at just the right height on the Center Control panel. And it still takes out the guesswork with built-in intelligence while delivering advanced cleaning power. 
Convenient Capacity, Compact Design: At just 24” wide, LG delivers towering convenience and advanced cleaning to even the smallest of spaces. Built on the same single unit platform with the washer on the bottom and the dryer on top, just in a narrower width. Despite its compact size, you’ll have plenty of room to handle hefty loads, with 2.4 cu. ft. capacity in the washer and 4.2 in the dryer., 
Single Unit WashTower Design: Redefine your space and reinvent how you do laundry with room to add a sink, a folding table or just organized storage—all with a sleek, streamlined look. Only LG WashTower has the convenient Center Control panel that’s perfectly positioned with both washer and dryer controls at just the right height., 
: Typical stacked washers and dryers place dryer controls at the very top, making them hard to see and reach without using a step stool every time. The ventless design on the dryer offers greater flexibility for more installation options., 
Dual Inverter HeatPump Technology: Meet a more modern approach to drying. LG's Dual Inverter HeatPump technology uses up to 65% less energy to dry every load.¹ Not only does this ENERGY STAR certified dryer feature LG’s most energy efficient ventless drying system, the low temperatures are easier on clothes and can help them look their best for longer. And with no need for venting, this dryer is easy to install and is virtually maintenance free., 
Inverter Direct Drive Motor System: When it comes to powerful, reliable performance, there’s just no comparison. Featuring LG exclusive Direct Drive Motor System, this ventless vertical laundry solution provides even washing performance and precise tumbling motions that are extra kind to delicates. You’ll enjoy quiet operation and greater energy efficiency than belt-driven motors—no belts, no pulleys, no worries. What else can you count on? The peace of mind of a 10-year limited warranty., 
Built-In Intelligence: AI Wash Sensor / Smart Pairing: Forget about endless sorting or toggling through cycles—built-in sensors use AI technology to detect fabric texture and load size, then automatically select the right wash motions, temperatures and more for advanced fabric care. With Smart Pairing, the washer can even tell the dryer to select a compatible drying cycle³, making it the ultimate laundry hack., 
Sensor Dry: No more damp clothes—the built-in sensor detects moisture levels and automatically adjusts drying time for loads of all sizes. No more overdrying—dryer shuts off at just the right time to save energy with less wear and tear on clothes., 
Advanced Washing: TurboWash 360° and Allergiene Wash Cycle: With top-of-the-line innovations, this LG WashTower delivers the advanced cleaning performance you need. TurboWash 360° powers through laundry, thanks to four jets with variable sprays that deliver a complete clean. The Allergiene wash cycle goes beyond everyday cleaning, using the power of steam to remove common household allergens such as dust mites, pet dander in fabrics by more than 90%⁴., 
Auto Cleaning Condenser: Unlike some dryers that require manual cleaning of the condenser for optimal performance, LG’s Auto Cleaning Condenser does the work for you. Using water extracted during the drying cycle, it powerfully flushes away lint and debris every time you dry for better airflow, better drying and enhanced energy efficiency—automatically., 
ThinQ Smart Technology: The ThinQ app offers control and convenience to help you simplify life and enjoy the comforts of home. Control your washer/dryer combo remotely or use voice commands with Google or Alexa voice assistants. Plus, download additional cycles and access Smart Diagnosis, customer support, and more., 
ThinQ UP: ThinQ UP enabled smart appliances receive continual software updates for new downloadable features and enhancements sent wirelessly to the appliance. Choose which features you want and customize your appliance based on your lifestyle and personal preferences., 
ThinQ Care: Available within the ThinQ app, ThinQ Care sends proactive usage, maintenance, and diagnostic alerts to your smartphone to help keep your LG smart appliances running smoothly., 
Tempered Glass Doors with Matte Black Rim: LG WashTower uses tempered glass doors for a sleek, stylish look that resists shock and scratches. Matte black rim complements the doors and enhances the premium feel., 
NeveRust Stainless Steel Tubs: Unlike tubs made from porcelain or plastic, the LG NeveRust Stainless Steel Tubs avoid the chips and nicks that can snag fabrics and ruin clothing. Durable surface actually gets smoother over time and keeps your washer and dryer looking like new, even after years of use., 
Tub Clean System: With the LG Tub Clean system, you don’t have to worry about mold, mildew or musty odors. Simply select the Tub Clean cycle, add liquid bleach or other cleaner and let the washer do the work to thoroughly clean and dry the tub, door and gaskets. Run it every month or so to keep your washer—and your laundry—clean and fresh., 
TrueBalance Anti-Vibration System: Noisy, out-of-balance loads can disrupt your laundry routine—and your day. LG helps you wash in peace with the TrueBalance anti-vibration system that keeps even big loads in balance to reduce washer noise and vibration. A must-have for main-floor or second-floor laundry rooms., 
LoDecibel Quiet Operation: Run the washer or dryer whenever you want, without interrupting naptime or your favorite show. The LG WashTower is designed for quiet operation, from the motor to the cabinet to individual components., 
Wrinkle Care Option: When you hate wrinkles but can’t be there to remove clothes as soon as they’re dry, just select the Wrinkle Care option before hitting start. The dryer will periodically tumble the load for up to 3 hours after the cycle is done or until the door is opened to help keep wrinkles at bay., 
: ¹Based on independent testing of a comparable model in normal cycle with normal dry mode, when compared with conventional heater dryer DLEC888W, in normal cycle with default option, 8.45 lb. load with 57.5% initial moisture content (January 2023)., 
: ²Half the functional floor space., 
: ³Both washer and dryer need to be registered in LG ThinQ app and connected to wi-fi to set up Smart Pairing feature., 
: ⁴Based on certification by the Asthma and Allergy Foundation of America (AAFA) and FIFRA Registration.,

TrueBalance anti-vibration system (washer): Noisy, off-balance loads can disrupt your laundry routine—and your day. Wash in peace with the TrueBalance anti-vibration system that keeps even big loads in balance, reducing noise and vibration. A must-have for main- or second-floor laundry rooms., 
LoDecibel Quiet Operation: Run the washer or dryer whenever you want, without interrupting naptime or your favorite show. The LG WashTower is designed for quiet operation, from the motor to the cabinet to individual components., 
Wrinkle Care option (dryer): Select the Wrinkle Care option before hitting start. The dryer will periodically tumble the load for up to 3 hours after the cycle is done or until the door is opened to help keep wrinkles at bay., 
SpeedWash Cycle (washer): Let's face it: Sometimes, you just don't have time to wait for a standard wash cycle. When you're in a rush, LG's SpeedWash Cycle gets small lightly soiled loads refreshed in just 15 minutes.,

Name: Electrolux - Laundry Tower Single Unit Front Load 4.4 Cu. Ft. Washer & 8 Cu. Ft. Electric Dryer - White
Description:
The Laundry Tower Single Unit Front Load 4.4 Cu. Ft. Washer & 8 Cu. Ft. Electric Dryer is a full-size and fully integrated front load Laundry Tower featuring a stacked design that takes up half the floor space, freeing up the laundry room for extra storage, all with an easy to reach control panel. The washer features LuxCare Wash that provides a thorough clean to clothes and fabrics, plus 15 minute fast wash and fast dry. 
Vertical stacked design that gives you back space: Fully integrated vertical layout takes up half the floor space of a traditional washer/dryer for greater laundry room flexibility. Features a full-sized washer on bottom, a full-sized dryer on the top, and a control panel in the middle for easy access., 
Thorough cleaning with the unique LuxCare Wash System: Improved wash actions, temperature control, and smart load sensing combine to ensure a thorough clean., 
15-Minute fast wash & 15-minute fast dry: Just 30 minutes for a wash and dry--quickly deep cleans and dries the items you need most., 
Extra large capacity: Easily clean large loads and even a king-sized comforter with extra large capacity (4.4 cu. ft. in the washer and 8.0 cu. Ft. in the dryer)., 
Keeps clothes looking their best without over drying: Clothes are gently tumbled while moisture sensors detect when clothes are dry to prevent over-drying., 
ENERGY STAR Certified: Electrolux washers and dryers meet strict criteria to guarantee high-quality energy efficient performance--without sacrificing clean., 
Extended refresh: Adds a rinse and spin after the wash cycle to keep garments fresh until you can switch them to the dryer., 
Extended tumble option keeps clothes tangle-free: Gently tumbles your clothes without heat to keep them tangle-free--perfect for when you cannot remove clothes right after the cycle ends., 
Reversible doors: Enjoy easy loading and unloading no matter where you place your Laundry Tower, even if it's next to a wall or in a corner, 
LuxCare lint shield helps avoid messes: Traps lint so it doesn’t make a mess, even if you empty it while there are clothes in the dryer.,
